title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Even if I am not asked, I am sure that there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. There are 3 principal reasons. In this essay, I will introduce them. First, we must quit using our cars inevitably when we think about the environment. Driving our cars links to increasing environmental problems. CO2 which cars exhaust rises our planet's temperature, kills a lot of forests, and causes dirty air we breatheeveryday. So, we have to cease driving cars rather than will do. Secondly, there will be no more rooms where we can park cars in common. Today, we have a lot of buildings, amusement parks, and other public facilities. There are few empty areas in Japan. And this must continue in the future. Cars are big objects. We will use not the big one but a small convenient object like a bike or our feet. Finally, about ourselves' health. Because cars are so fast and comfortable, we often use cars. When we drive cars, what we only use is our arms.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I do agree with the statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. Advertisements are produced to promote a product and to make it sell better. So what do we do if we want people to buy our product? We try to tell them that our product is the best choice on the market, which is maybe not true, but people need to believe it to choose our product. That is the reason why many advertisements make it seem their products are much better than they actually are. In our every day lives we are confronted with many examples. My favourite examples are the washing powder advertisements on television. Wouldn't it be wonderful to put your clothes in the washing machine and when taking them out again, all the ugly stains are gone and the clothes look newer than before? I have tried several times, but it just does not work. So there the advertisements definitely make the washing powder much better than it is. Another product which has to be incredible according to the advertisement, are energy bars for sports. You do not only get an unhuman power and condition, but the bar turns your outer appearance into an athlete's body.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the following statement. Because I am not a child, i can do many things by myself, and can do them well. First hand, i think many people want to have their own place, they can think and they can do anything they want to do. Young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have many things to enjoy life. Such as shopping,swimming,singing,running and so on. There are many ways to enjoy yourself. But old people do not have so many things to enjoy life. They like to go out for a walk,and to look at newspapers. Sometimes they like to be with their children to have dinner. Second hand, i like to do something myself, i don't like to do something that's allowed by my parents. I will feel some dissatisfaction. I want to have a lot of time to do my things. I like travelling and i want to go to HongKong and America one day. I like America so much,i want to study there with many new friends, I want to meet many new friends in America. But my parents don't want me to make a lot of friends, they want me to study everyday. But i don't want to study everyday,i want to have some free time that is only for me to be with my friends. So, i think the statement is not right.

Young people have many things to enjoy life. Such as shopping,swimming,singing,running and so on. There are many ways to enjoy yourself. But old people do not have so many things to enjoy life. They like to go out for a walk,and to look at newspapers. Sometimes they like to be with their children to have dinner. Second hand, i like to do something myself, i don't like to do something that's allowed by my parents. I will feel some dissatisfaction. I want to have a lot of time to do my things. I like travelling and i want to go to HongKong and America one day. I like America so much,i want to study there with many new friends, I want to meet many new friends in America. But my parents don't want me to make a lot of friends, they want me to study everyday. But i don't want to study everyday,i want to have some free time that is only for me to be with my friends.", 'So, i think the statement is not right.']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I think that to learn ideas and concepts it is ok but until some point because what would happen if i had a lot of knowledge and i did nt know when or how to use it, on the other hand we just cant only know facts because if we just know facts but if we dont have any idea or concept of how to use it, we have nothing. For example if a doctor knows all the concepts and the ideas you have to know about medicine and the human body but never works with a person or does a surgery on his own when he finally has a person in front of him waiting for a surgery he will probably be nervous because he has never done a surgery before, but if the same doctor had all the knowledge in surgery rooms all the time,But if the same doctor has a previous experience with people and some ideas and concepts he can do a surgery completely sure of what he is doing without the fear of making something wrong.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Yes , I agree with the Statement "The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide ". Willing to travel along with a group of people is a good option rather than travelling alone. There were many factors which would benefit us while we were travelling in a group led by a tour guide. Firstly ,by considering the security factor which is a big task in tours especially in foreign countries ,we can feel more security while we are along with a group of people rather than alone. Even in the case of some tough situations we will get the support of everybody in a group. Secondly ,travelling in a group is economically more recommended than travelling alone. We can share the experiences and joy while we are travelling in a group and we can benefit from most of the expenditures we will face. Many tourism departments in various countries are offering good tourism packages for people who are coming for foreign tours. They are providing discounts and valid packages especially for people travelling in a group rather than travelling alone. Thirdly ,we can have a planned timetable and we can have a lot of fun all along the tour along with our group members ,we can plan more programmes and events which will entertain us along with our fellow members and we can even have a large.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I strongly agree that ,it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than to learn facts. It is very difficult and there is not much use in memorizing the facts. In the olden days teaching methods they trained in learning facts but now due to the latest technology development all facts are on the computer and the internet is available in seconds of a click, so we dont need to memorize facts. For example if a student memorizes dates and events that took place in the 18th century they may not be beneficial. but the concepts and ideas are trained they will develop new inventions ,create wonderful things. Young minds are creative full of enthusiasm so filling these valuable brains with dead curriculum and dead facts in this 21stcentury ,I dont agree. Humans have already developed computers which can store facts.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: My opinion about having broad knowledge of many academic subjects is that having broad knowledge of one specific subject is that broad knowledge is much better for our studies than the one specific subject, which reasons include that broad knowledge could open our horizons about the whole study and we could have wider rangesfor us to choose our majors through studying broad knowledge. In modern times, many jobs need various knowledge because the matters require complete abilities and broad knowledge which contents many academic subjects, such as math, physics and chemistry could provide a broader knowledge for us which one specific subject could not. For example, If we are a lawyer, we not only use the knowledge about the law, we still need the knowledge about the economy and human nature. We would benefit from broader knowledge in our work. It provides us with more information when we should solve a problem. Furthermore, we would choose our major from what we learned in school and studying broad subjects across the range for us to choose. What I have found now is that which major I should choose. Though I have already studied some subjects, I still do not figure out which major suits me best. This is an important aspect because I should use the knowledge about my major after graduation and I would earn money by working in this field.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I totally disagree with the statement, 'Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities'. WE ARE, if the word community determines not a division on the basis of ' race, colour or creed'. The new generation of young people are more social conscious than those in the past. They broke open many barriers that older generations of same age group lived in. The new ads on the TV would speak to the extent of support even from their parents do young people receive for participating in helping their communities. In this case, the ad begins showing a distressed young man sitting on a balcony watching the streets he lives in. He is shocked to see the state of living he is in, with roads filled with litter, nothing in place. He then gets shocked to see a little boy searching for food near a bin. This little boy awakens to the plight of situations that can be altered. He invites his friends not for an outing like any other weekend, but to clean up the streets, not waiting for help from the government. They also help the little boy with some food, and they raise donations to help the boy with education. Parents are shown not restricting the movements of the boys. That could just be an ad, but it depicts the state of mind the new generation has. We are capable of bads, but if molded, we can make the best out of the worst. We are scheduling the time more perfectly, devoting time to everything. Our generation is 'Jack of all, and also MASTER of all'.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: With young and old people, we have two different ways to see things. In some points you enjoy your life more as a young person than an old one, but this statement works in the other sense too. For a young person, life is a train that you don`t have to miss, in other words, you must enjoy your life as much as possible as a young person , because when you get old you are not able to do all the things you were able to do before. When you are young you have a permanent energy that gives you this happiness of living that allows you to do everything, like go out in the evening and go to work in the morning without being tired, or just practise a lot of activities like climbing, scuba diving. For sure, scuba diving is not advised for old people because of heart problems. This example justifies why being old can appear as the end of freedom. You are more fragile, your body is not the same, you are not the same. But being old is not essentially the end of life. As the wine is getting better when it`s getting older, people become better when they getolder.

You are more fragile, your body is not the same, you are not the same. But being old is not essentially the end of life.', 'As the wine is getting better when it`s getting older, people become better when they getolder.']

When you are old you often seek, your body doesn`t work as well as it was used to, and furthermore you just remember the past, when you were young.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with people who try new things and take risks rather than doing one thing that they already know how to do well. People who always try new things  are more creative and innovative than others. They have an ambition to do new things and try to get the success with it. They even have to take risks with it, because of doing the new things that nobody is trying to do, they will get more precious and helpful experiences in their life time. They are the people who other people want nowadays, for example, even in large companies where they try to hire new employees, they will search for people with a creative mind not the people who have the same mind as any others. Of course, some companies could look for people who are ordinary and not try new things and keep going on with the old ones. However we can see in our environments, the people who try new things and take risks are the leaders in their areas because that is what the companies want. The people who only do one thing and do not want to take the risks of it, are the ones who get the introductions from the people above them and do what they do well usually do.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Since the invention of the first car, their amount has always increased causing a lot of damage to the environment. Nevertheless,I believe that in twenty years, this worrying tendency will decrease. First of all, it will be very harmful to the environment if the amount of cars tends to increase more and more. That is why, in the next few years, the government will have to take strict measures to prevent people from using their cars every day. There already are some measures such as when the pollution is too high , only certain kinds of car are allowed to circulate. But , as far as I am concerned, the government should do more and strengthen the law. They can develop public transport and make it cheaper for me. Moreover, the price of fuel has strongly increased, and it will cost and will cost more money to travel by car, even if other energy is developed. Many people cannot afford to pay more and will find more benefits not using their car, but rather public transport. An other reason makes me believe that the number of cars will decrease. Indeed, technological progress is more and more developed and performed quickly. In a few years, Cars will be replaced by some innovations which enable people to move cheaper, faster and easier. To conclude, even if automobile firms intend to create cheaper and more environmentally friendly cars, I think that news innovation will be created in the expanse of the cars.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Let me introduce myself first. I am from Japan and have grown up there. I totally agree that young people recently do not give enough time to helping their communities. Some reasons why young people do not are that in Japanese society, there are more interests, such as playing video games and intervention like busystudying. Or young people tend not to have any interests in others. Most elderly people say "a long time ago young people had sufficient time for helping their communities. "However, time is always changing, therefore, young people do not want to help or not like their communities at all. Even if their parents may not care about those communities, so they might not push their sons or daughters to go to communities. On the other hand, because Japanese people are studying so harder than playing, and some young people have to focus on studying instead of helping the communities, they do not have time to go to communities. Not only Japanese people study so hard, but also do Asian people study very hard if we compare between Asia and North America. Americans may have enough time to help their communities because I saw young Americans using my eyes. Also, I heard from my friends who are Americans that Japanese people are studying harder than Americans. It means that Japanese people do not have time to help their communities. In Japan, there are some of the worst booms for young people. We called the boom: "Hikikomori Phenomenon. "Young Japanese (young adults too! )tends to stay at their houses, especially, and spend time there in a whole day.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We often hear the word "NEET" in Japan, NEET is the person who has only part time jobs or does not have jobs. I have some friends who are NEET. They have free time, so they can enjoy life without thinking about time or dates. Now, I am a graduate student. I work in my laboratory from early morning to late at night everyday. I am busy everyday, so I am always thinking that I want to have a rest. For me, I sometimes envy NEET's life because they have freedom. However, I don't think that it is good that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I have 2 reasons. First, young people need a lot of money if they want to enjoy life like older people. But in most cases, many young people earn so much money.
sents: ['We often hear the word "NEET" in Japan, NEET is the person who has only part time jobs or does not have jobs. I have some friends who are NEET. They have free time, so they can enjoy life without thinking about time or dates. Now, I am a graduate student. I work in my laboratory from early morning to late at night everyday. I am busy everyday, so I am always thinking that I want to have a rest. For me, I sometimes envy NEET\'s life because they have freedom. However, I don\'t think that it is good that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I have 2 reasons. First, young people need a lot of money if they want to enjoy life like older people.', 'But in most cases, many young people earn so much money.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I think there weren't twenty years a go, but I know that in that period there were fewer cars in use than there are today. I think that there are many historical reasons to explain the huge spread of the car in the last twenty years. Starting thanks to Henry Ford and his way of production of cars it was possible to start to make cars at a minor cost and in a minor time. Thanks to this starting improving the car has become a common means of transportation. In fact, a production less expensive has permitted us to reduce the price to buy a car and more people can have the possibility to buy one. A second historical reason that has caused a big spread of the car is the economic improvement of society. After the industrial revolution, the factory has become the most common method of production. With the arrival of the factory most people start to work in a factory.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Actually, both of them enjoy their life. But, there is a difference between young people and older people. Older people don't have much energy like young people. They've worked hard for a long time, and it's possible that they have already seen many good things, and had experiences before. Therefore, they'll not be interested in doing or enjoying many things. Some old people really enjoy their life, but I think young people can enjoy it more than older people.

Therefore, they'll not be interested in doing or enjoying many things.", 'Some old people really enjoy their life, but I think young people can enjoy it more than older people.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. This is like this. A lot of younger people are very enthusiastic about their young life to explore new things so as to enjoy the maximum extent as the older people who have experienced almost all the things in their life tend to relax in their older ages. Now, young people who are new to the world with new intentions like to spend their time enjoying life as much as possible like doing many things, such as going to the theaters to watch films and pubs every weekend to have fun, can play a lot of games together and even participate in high level tournaments, can have sex, can enjoy their university life as a student and many other things. Many of these things can also be enjoyed by older people but they are bored with doing them as they did a lot in their young life. Playing sports requires a lot of strength and energy which older people lack. Having a lot of parties with friends in young life is another important thing to be considered which older people may find difficult to do as often as young people do and they also think that they are a waste of money. To some extent even older people who are still interested will enjoy attending the parties and pubs. One more important thing is the student life, which will not be repeated again. Students enjoy themselves a lot in universities in many respects such as sports, research and even in some other co-curricular activities. Older people can definitely not do that again, but can enjoy it as a professor which is quite different from student life.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Older people enjoy life better than young people do. The older people have what they want;however, young people always run after the things that they want to achieve. Firstly, older people did every kind of thing to stand by their feet. They solved a lot of problems,they spent their time handling things in the best way. When they become older, they start to enjoy life. They take long vacations. For instance my parents , they are quite old. They take long vacations in the summer. Actually they spend all their summer on an island. They do not think about the problems because they do not have problems.

Firstly, older people did every kind of thing to stand by their feet. They solved a lot of problems,they spent their time handling things in the best way. However, older people can have a health problem ,it is a serious problem they can have. It is the disadvantages being older ,but if they spend the time well and if they take care of themselves,this problem can be out of their life. Secondly, young people always try to achieve a thing. they spend their time working so as not to be relaxed. When he is a teenager, he tries to do well in his school courses. In high school he tried to attend a good college to find good jobs. Young people always try to solve problems. When they take a vacation,they are not happy ,their minds are not clear ,they usually think about how to solve these problems. They can not enjoy life. Furthermore, young people have that problem they usually think about what they will be. These ideas prevent them from being relaxed. In conclusion, older people enjoy life rather than young people do. They spent their youth achieving every thing that they wanted and needed. When they become older,they spend the rest of their life looking after what they did and enjoying life.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Some people might say that using a tour guide is a waste of money. But, fundamentally, I agree with the idea that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. My primary reason is that using a tour guide is safer than not using one. In particular, people who participate in the group travel have less experience of going abroad. They completely lack knowledge about this foreign country. A tour guide has a lot of experience and a lot of information about it. For example, in Asia, there are many dangerous areas which almost all residents keep away from. If you are taught by a tourist about this information, you will not face the dangerous situation. However, it is true that there are poor guides. Preventing you from hiring a bad tourist, you should choose a big company which provides good service. The second reason is that the tour guide can lead you to a good place where you can not be detected by yourself. In particular, on a short trip, you should go around some country in a hurry, and you do not have enough time to spare. In this point of view, the existence of a tour guide can reduce the waste of time. In addition, he can provide a lot of information which makes your trip more exciting. If you do not hire a tour guide , you will regret it. Most people seldom go on a trip, at most, once in a year.
sents: ['Some people might say that using a tour guide is a waste of money. But, fundamentally, I agree with the idea that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. My primary reason is that using a tour guide is safer than not using one. In particular, people who participate in the group travel have less experience of going abroad. They completely lack knowledge about this foreign country. A tour guide has a lot of experience and a lot of information about it. If you do not hire a tour guide , you will regret it.', 'Most people seldom go on a trip, at most, once in a year.']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I kind of disagree with this statement. I agree that understanding ideas and concepts are important, but learning facts is also important. By understanding ideas and concepts students learn how facts take place. It is not just once you understand ideas, you do need to worry about how facts happen. For example, my professor explained the process of the earthquake. She briefly described each and every detail about it. Now i know how an earthquack happens, but what if i do not know the facts of it. How can i prove my concept of the earth quack, if i do not have a specific example. If i said that there are earthquack happen in indonesia, and explain these are the reasons this happens over there more often, then i support my statement. My facts support my concept and ideas. The  happening of the earthquake in indonesia is a fact. I need to know it to understand my concept better. Facts are important in order to understand the concept. You can not say that fact does not worth it. Without fact no concept and no idea take place. Facts are the life of concepts. One more example here is that countries in the southern hemisphere have a warmer climate and countries in the northern hemisphere have a cooler climate. How can i prove this statement? I will give all my geographical reasons and explanation. How can I prove all my geographical reasons? Now to have facts is important. If i say that the United States is in the Northern Hemisphere and that is why it has a cloudy climate, and Sri Lanka is in the Southern Hemisphere and that is why it has a warm climate.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I think both points are equally important in college but in your later life it would be more important to understand the arguments and basics than to learn the facts off by hard work. Nobody can understand a theme just by learning simple facts, it is the complex idea that makes someone understand. Everybody can learn things off by hard, but not everyone understands the material. And the understanding for me makes a person grow not only its mind but also its personality. But still there are some benefits to both sides. When I had history classes in school for instance, I was always really good at understanding the ideas and concepts that were discussed, but always when I had to write an exam I had problems remembering important dates. And that is what the main point of history is, isn't it? The result was that I never got a better mark than a three. That is just the average mark in Germany. But when I started to study the dates which resemble the facts in the question. I suddenly got much better marks. On the other hand if I had just known the dates I would have gotten a much worse mark, because I probably wouldn't have understood any of the assignments. But I also think that there are cases where you just have to know simple facts. In some parts of biology, chemistry, physics and maths, in all science. I mean if you have to label body parts of an animal or human, there is no way in doing that without knowing the facts. An eye is an eye and not a leg, this is quite obvious.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I think understanding ideas and concepts is more important for students than it is for them to learn facts. The reason is that understanding ideas and concepts is more creative activity for students. When we try to understand the ideas and concepts, we must consider lots of factors of ideas and concepts. First we must confirm whose ideas or concepts they are, to add more information to them as the backgrounds. Next, we make an analysis of why they have the ideas or the concepts using acquired background information. After these practices, we can approach the stage to make answers or own opinions. To get answers or opinions, students can have a discussion with friends, parents, and brothers. In addition, they can get some suggestions from their teachers or they can also conduct investigations using books or the internet to add more information. I think that these consequent practices are very important for students to develop their way of thinking. In contrast, learning facts does not need such pressures. It is easy to access the facts without any kind of thinking. To learn facts, students just sit down on their seats in the class room and just listen to what their teacher says. In this case, the information is only given from their teacher to students. If students listen to what their teacher says and write it down in their notebook, they can get new knowledge.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Traveling is a very important aspect in our life. By traveling we can experience another culture and traditions. Some people like to travel alone and some do not, they like to travel in a group. A tour guide is one of the strategies that travelers always experience. Traveling in a group has many advantages. First it allows a person to share the ideas which are provided by the other travels and sometimes the person will learn from his group. Second a group can help each other in bad situations as the saying goes " A friend in need is a friend indeed". Moreover the person can have such a nice time with them especially when they are friends. For the last two years, I have been to the United kingdom regularly, in London. I had a great time there, but I believe that I would have a greater time if I went with a tour guide. I did not visit everything there because I didn't know where I should go. However, my cousin visits all the museums and the malls there and all of that refers to the tour guide. Tour guides are beneficial for tourists because they help them not to know what places they should visit.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Although its an ambitious and challenging motive to have broad knowledge about many academic subjects,I would rather have knowledge about one particularsubject. There are a few reasons why i feel this way. Firstly, knowledge of all subjects means a lot of information and plenty of hardwork and time for gaining the information. As a result of these complex interactions of the above factors,most of the time adequate knowledge of any of the subjects is not acquired. As a result of this a person becomes a jack of all Trades but master of none. Secondly,lots of subjects mean a lot of hardwork,and there will be too little time for personal life,which means he will have less time for making new friends,watching movies and partying. After all education is only one part of the curriculum ,there are many other activities to be done to make an all round personality. As a result of this his social life might be affected,and he will fit into the classic old saying,All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy! ! Finally ,at the end of his education period if he feels that there is no looking back for him,since he has acquired all the knowledge,he is then dumped again.

There are a few reasons why i feel this way. Firstly, knowledge of all subjects means a lot of information and plenty of hardwork and time for gaining the information. As a result of these complex interactions of the above factors,most of the time adequate knowledge of any of the subjects is not acquired. As a result of this a person becomes a jack of all Trades but master of none. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I really agree with the statement. In Italy, the place where I live there are a lot of advertisements that make products seem much better than they really are, I hope these advertisements will disappear because I think that the way people spend money is not a joke. I could write a lot of examples about these things. I have a friend, Kate, she bought a shower gel that ensures her body skin becomes smooth just like silk, but it isn't the truth! Another example could be the lcd televisions that clerks encourage you to buy with the promise of a great view and a lot of light, but then you discover that you need to submit a new pay-per-view frequency to see it.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Do young people enjoy life more than older people do? The person who asks this question in the present day may receive more positive answers. Yet, I think this question will have a varied answer due to the time it is asked. In the present day, new technologies keep being developed each day. For most parts, young children and adolescents are usually the targets of the technologies which are designed for them. The gaming consoler war (PS3, Xbox360, Netindo Wii) during last Christmas appeared to be a perfect example. The gaming market has targeted all the younger groups instead of those older people. Therefore, young people have more choices to relax right now and in the future. Also, most considered "young" people are still in the process of learning. It can have more possibilities to develop new interests while learning or trying a new thing. Once the interest is ensured, young people know how they should have fun with it. Yet, that applies to the present day. On the other hand, if this question was being asked in the past like in the 18th or even 16th century , then most answers may appear to be towards older people. In the past, young people had to deal with educational and economic problems harder than those well-established adults. The younger groups did not appear to have time to enjoy life before they grew  up. But older people might enjoy life as much as they can. By looking over the history, old barons and nobles had way more advantage in enjoying life than young children.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Many people are afraid when they try something new. On the other hand, some people enjoy the afraid feeling and the risks. Many times, some people, who try something not familiar, could be successful, fortunately. In my opinion, trying new things is effective and essential to make one's life and others' lives successful. The first reason why I think trying something new is right is that it needs to be brave. Even though there are a lot of damage and risks as you try a new thing, the difficulties probably can give chances to your life. Bravery is one of the most important factors in order to not only be successful but also live with confidence. In that, trying something new means the person is very brave, which needs to be self-esteem oneself. I believe someone, who loves himself , can enjoy his or her life. In addition, trying something new gives more opportunities. If you do what you already know how to do well, you will probably not fail. However, you cannot succeed as much as you want, because the ordinary thing is for everyone. The new things are the only way to get more opportunities. For example, Bill Gates is the richest person in the world. However, at first, his company was not that wealthy to make him the wealthiest person on Earth, because the "computer business" was not famous, then. Fortunately, Gates challenges into the new field, and he achieves his goals and helps other humans to enjoy computers. Finally, trying new things makes the world improve. When people who try new things achieve success, it means the world becomes more comfortable.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: When we predict the future, we can see fewer cars in use than there are today. Nowadays, we use cars the most of the time. When we go to school, go to the office, or go to the store, we take our cars with us; but the car is not the best way for transportation actually. There are many problems that come up when we take cars. First of all, there are limited resources to make cars move. As we can see in the newspapers, gasoline is running out. We can make a soloer power to make a car move, but we cannot ride a car when we do not have sunlight, such as in the winter season.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: As far as I am concerned, it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. A student, in general, even if he has the idea of what to do in his working future, does not always match his dreams with the real life. It can happen that the economic situation at the beginning of his studies could be very different from the one at the end of his studies. This can happen for several reasons, such as political, economic, and so on. If a student starts to concentrate only on a specific subject, that can be for example, literature , at the end of his studies I will be very well educated on that subject, but in a world that is requiring people that have technological skills. It is important to say that a student that is involved in many academic subjects will be able to manage all of it, but he will always have the possibility to specialize in one of them. I want to say that the best choice to make is to study many academic subjects because it is always possible to specialize in one specific subject during the study period. On the other hand it is always more difficult to change its own study plan from a specific subject to many academic subjects. Only if a student has the chance to study different academic subjects can he also have the opportunity to discover his talent in subjects that he did not know that he was able to do. Sometimes talent is hidden and only a good teacher can help students to reveal it. Students, if they decide to study only a specific academic subject, will not give the chance to any professor to discover their talent. The Italian University educational approach is based on many academic subjects that can give students the opportunity to learn different topics and also not linked from each one. Only after university , can they choose to specialize in one specific subject. I can see that Italian students, in the end, are more prepared than USA students, these latter are too specialized in only one subject and unable to face real life so different and changeable.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: It is better to start by describing successful people; they have an unlimited brain, they do not think like normal people and they are capable of getting used to new conditions. After this description it is not possible to disagree that `Successful people try new things and take risks rather than doing what they already know how to do well` idea. `Taking risks makes money` and `More risk=more money` is accepted ideas in the economy and this idea forces successful people to go on doing something new. Success is a sickness, like using some illegal drugs, when you start overcoming some problems (we call it success) you need more to make yourself more successful. We can say it is not only making some money, it is trying to make(earn) ALL the money in the world.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the opinion that young people do not give enough time to help their communities for the following reasons. First, young people are less interested in the activities of their communities, although communities are indispensable for people to live in. For example, I participate in a clean up activity around the central station of my city. This activity is held every week and young people who live in my city are strongly encouraged to attend, however, there are few young people among the participants. This example clearly shows that young people do not spend enough time helping their communities. Second, the vote rate of young people in elections in Japan is generally much less than that of elderly people, although joining the political process of communities is an important activity to keep their communities active and healthy. To join the political process, the voter must have their opinion about their communities. If young people participate in their communities, they should have some opinion about the situation or future of their communities, and they should have a strong incentive to go voting. This is the reason why I think young people do not spend enough time helping their communities. Third, there are many companies which help elderly people with their house hold errands and chores. The companies run their customers' errands instead of instead of elderly people.

This activity is held every week and young people who live in my city are strongly encouraged to attend, however, there are few young people among the participants. This example clearly shows that young people do not spend enough time helping their communities. This is the reason why I think young people do not spend enough time helping their communities. Third, there are many companies which help elderly people with their house hold errands and chores.', "The companies run their customers' errands instead of instead of elderly people."]

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I really agree with this topic. When I see the advertisement, I become to want it or eat it or drink it. I have experience of it. When I was watching TV, I saw the commercial about "Taco-Bell". I had never eaten it. It seemed really good. Then after school, I asked my host mother to take me there because I seriously wanted to eat it. Then we went there. And I ordered it. I was very surprised when it came. It was just like my finger size. When I watched the commercial it was much bigger than in reality. And it was warm, not hot. I always become to want it when I see the advertisement. So I was glad it was not like a machine. Because it was not so expensive. Sometimes I really want to get something expensive when I see the advertisement. But I can stop feeling that I want it. I think because I missed Taco-Bell"'s meal. As we can see there are many advertisements in the world. I don't think it is good to make products seem much better than they really are. It is a kind of trickster. It is kind of illegal things! ! However if I became someone who was selling something, I would have the advertisement.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I agree that there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. Since oil is running out, cars, in the future, will be less valued and sought than in the past and present, and there is an increasing demand for private helicopters or airplanes by which people can save time waiting for traffic congestion.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Generally, the purpose of an advertisement is to promote and advocate the advantages of its subject or to create publicity so that its potential consumers may now how and where to purchase it. None of the definitions above suggest that the advertisement ought to make the product "look better".

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I strongly agree with the statement " it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. "Students are required to understand ideas and concepts. The main reason for this is the ideas are going to increase the way they think and the concepts help them to implement their thoughts. The lecturers should teach students to get ideas for new things from their childhood. They should give some questions and tell them to implement their lessons. Such that their brain gets more ideas when they see or come to know about a particular point. Suppose for example let us take a topic in mathematics , there are many ways to solve one particularproblem. Here comes a picture of ideas the, student thinks of in many different ways to solve a particular problem any how, these can be implemented only by concepts but not facts. And puzzles can be solved by implementing different ideas. Suppose a puzzle has many ways then only an idea can help him to find the right way. Facts are those which have already taken place. Facts can be learned on their own. One can gather facts from newspapers, magazines and many other places.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Young people enjoy life more than older people do? To answer this question is important to take two points of view, the first one is to answer why young people enjoy life, and then answer why old people enjoy life, and finally i will see who enjoy life more, young people or older people. I think that younger people enjoy life, because they are in an age where everything is known, they are exploring the world, they are dreaming, they are building their goal, which is a wonderful moment in life. It is when people start to grow up , and during this process they understand and respond to many questions that only living can answer, It is a stage when you can make a mistake, and it is ok because you are learning, no one is going to judge you, It is part of learning. I think that i am in a great moment of my life, I feel and I am young, and if i take my own experience i can say that i really enjoy my life, i had difficulties in my life but they were just part of it, sometimes you need to feel and then stand up and go on, thats life. By the other hand, i think that older people also enjoy life, because no matter the age that you have you will always learn , and at this point in your life you have more experience, so you dont have to worry about if you are going to make a mistake, because you know that if you make it everything will be ok. For example my grand ma was an old lady, but she was a kid, she never felt old, she always learning , and at this point in her life she had more experience ,t do when se was a child so she didn't have to worry about it. Know she is death, but she teaches that life is only one and you have to enjoy it, no matter your age.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Depending on the circumstances to which the question could be posed, the answers vary accordingly. Of course, young adults have completely different sources of enjoyment to middle aged people who in turn, have different enjoyment to a pensioner. Depending on where you find a place in this chain will distinguish what you consider fun. A younger crowd will enjoy attending parties, attending night clubs, doing rather challenging and more physically tiring sports. A middle aged person might enjoy playing a game of chess or maybe going to the opera and for that middle aged person, attending noisy parties and doing dangerous sports might not be enjoyment at all. Therefore, depending on the age that you have, whatever you do will bring upon it the correct benefit. There is a typically trend that young people believe that they enjoy life more than an older person because they believe that the younger you are the more fun you can have, this i believe is incorrect because, yes of course, the younger you are the more options of enjoyment you might think you mighthave. For example, a father of a child would rather spend time with his son or daughter rather than attend a gathering full of 20-year-olds just because he has different priorities. A young person would not enjoy spending time with relatives or older members of his family simply because at that age, you tend to have different obligations, different points of interest and a different type of mentality. Younge rpeople tend to feel that as your age you miss out on what is really fun, but we must remember that older people were young at one point and what a young person thinks a older person will never dream of doing, might just probably mean that it was already done.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I disagree with the statement, because for me it is always necessary to take some risks and try new things to have success and not only when you know how to do well. In fact for me, if you don't try one thing, you don't try another thing because you don't have the experience that the precedent thing can giveyou. For example, if you don't try to use a bicycle, you don't learn to go with it, and after you don't learn to use a scooter, it is more difficult than using a bicycle. But if you learn to go over a bicycle, after you can also use a scooter ; so you can use both of them. The Experiences that you try to do, help you to endure your life. This is the main reason why i say that it is important to take risks and try new things and new adventures. And for me also the worst experiences are important because they also help you not to commit the same errors another time. title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It is debatable whether young people do not give enough time to helping their communities or not. some people say that they can not find the reason why they have to care about their communities. However, I firmly believe that helping their communities is quite an important thing in their life. First of all, We can not live by ourselves. we have to help each other. of course that is an option and we can choose whatever we want, but nowadays, It would be harder and harder if people tried to live bythemselves. If we try to spend our time in communities, It can be a good way to get to know many people who can help us when we get into a hard time. For example, I was trying to have my own piano recitle in my communites. and I heard that is not so easy. but fortunately I was a volunteer in my community last summer and through that experience, I had a chance to get to know lots of people who could help me. so I could have a report very easily because of their recommendations. Secondly, we can improve our social skills. nowadays, people tend to be isolated. but I dont think that is the best way to live. For example, I have a friend and she always tries to be alone in her room.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement. Young people do enjoy their life morethan older people,young people have more energy and more adrenalin which boosts them to do whatever they want on the other hand, older people have less energy and enthusiasm, and their bodies are weak and so they have to think twice before they do anything. For example if a young man wants to go for a tour in his holidays then the first thing that comes to his mind is where to go, whom to take, when etc but when an old person considers a trip to go somewhere the first thing that comes to his mind is how long the journey will be and what all precautions he needs to take. young people can freely do whatever they want but older people may have many health problems which will restrict them from doing things which they would have liked to do. Young people can eat ,drink and do anything they like but older people will have many restrictions. When it comes to sports young people are encouraged to play many of them, whereas older people are always cautioned and even they are afraid to play to their full potential. Older people's mindsets are mainly different when compared to younger people like they look at life as a journey coming to an end mostly thinking about what they have achieved and feeling satisfied, whereas young people never think of their past they always plan their future, they view their life as a beginning of a great journey. For example older people think about their college days when they were young always thinking of funny things and their personal experiences and feeling satisfied.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the title statement. Young people enjoy life more than older people. I can demonstrate from three aspects of it. First, young people have more activities to do. Young people can go travelling any where in any condition or do all kinds of sports even if they are not good at them, But older people because of some kind of sickness. they could not take some traffic like the ship. There are also some sports because of the age problem, they could not enjoy them. and we often see some instruction in the playground. some really good games are age restricted. Second, young people's minds are older than the old ones. they are easier to accept and learn new things. for instance, the internet. young people can use email or some on linetool to communicate with each other like msn or skype, but older people could not. for example, my mother can just simply look on the internet. it is not that easy to send email or chat on the Internet, that is because the speed of typing is very slow. for my grandmother it is a problem even though she wants to surf the internet. Computer games have so much fun, but they can not enjoy them. so young people enjoy life more than older people do. Finally, young people have good boys to enjoy life. the older people are often trapped by the health problems. when they become older. they often get some serious illnesses.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: i disagree with the idea that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. i think that understanding ideas and concepts is very important, but i think also that learning facts is not less important than ideas and concepts. they are at least at the same level. i think that ideas and concepts are at the basis of a theory and so they are at the basis of our knowledge, but sometimes facts can replace and modify the original theory, so it is important to know the real facts! In Italy there is a famous affermation that is "la migliore teoria e' la pratica" that can be translated in english as "the best theory is the real practice ", and i think that this affermation represents perfectly my opinion.

In Italy there is a famous affermation that is "la migliore teoria e\' la pratica" that can be translated in english as "the best theory is the real practice ", and i think that this affermation represents perfectly my opinion.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I do not agree with this statement because I think it is impossible for us to live without cars. If it said there would be fewer cars in use than there are in fifty years, I think I might agree, though. The first reason I disagree with this is that in America, people can not go anywhere without using cars because they do not have good transportation systems as we do. Also, I do not think they can improve transportation systems such as trains because America has too large a continent so that it will not be easy to make railways all over the continents. I think this can be said in many countries. Next, cars are really useful in our lives. When somebody in your family gets sick late at night, you can drive to the hospital by yourself and it is much more comfortable for sick people to get around by car. If there will be fewer cars in use in the future, what will help our emergency trips? A robot? I do not think there will be new instruments invented in the next two decades.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I would like to answer this question by introducing what that means: enjoy life. Whether people enjoy their lives or not depends on many things. Firstly, it could depend on your hobbies, like playing basketball or fishing. Both are completely different and you might say that fishing is more suitable for older people whereas basketball is more suitable for younger people. Secondly, it depends on your social circumstances. This means some people enjoy spending time with their family. Others like to go to parties whenever possible. This can also be related to age. Additionally it could depend on the education. Higher educated people maybe would like to visit an opera rather than hanging around in a bar. Today a lot of people think education was much better in former times. Nevertheless I believe younger people enjoy life more for several reasons (but this answer is somehow biased, because I think I am young). All the reasons mentioned above cannot lead to an adequate answer from my point of view, because those are personal things. Younger people enjoy life more, because they have less responsibilities. So younger people have more space to be spontaneous than older people have. Furthermore younger people are on average healthier, which gives them the possibility of doing more things in a shorter period of time. In addition there is a lot of stuff to discover, which older people may have discovered already. The advantage of older people is that they usually have more money for enjoying life, but I believe that is caused by today's globalization it is less important. Everything becomes cheaper and money is not required for enjoying life.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The statement, 'successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well" is telling us that, to succeed, you have to try new things and take risks rather than always doing the way you are really good at. I agree with the statement. I think it helps to make something you are not really good at and make it one of the things you are good at. It also makes you experience many things and experiences success, and sometimes fail. That teaches us what is right and what is wrong. In your life, you have to try many things. When you are a baby, you have to try to get up and walk. If you don't start with that kind of risk, you will never walk, and not be like a normal person. Taking risks might be something very difficult. It might also be very easy. When you try something, you can like it, or you can hate it. It's all your choice. for example, this term, it tried for all the sports teams in school. I thought I was really bad at basketball, but when I joined the team, I figured out that I really liked it, and was actually better than what I thought. Making my self made me have a new hubby and try to be better at it. Trying and taking risks helps you to learn what is right and what is wrong. When you try, you sometimes succeed, and sometimes fail. My dad told me that failing makes you succeed more and helps you learn what to do next to not failing at the same thing. For example, my brother really liked tennis even though he didn't do it. When he tried, he found out that he didn't like it at all. From then, he didn't do tennis, and found out that one of his hobbies wasn't really his hobby. In that case, he failed and also succeeded in what he tried. He failed at guessing what his hobby was, but he succeeded in finding out what his real hobby was. I think successful people always try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. It helps people to try and be good at something you tried. It also makes you learn what is right and what is wrong and makes you not make the mistake you did again when you do it again.

From then, he didn\'t do tennis, and found out that one of his hobbies wasn\'t really his hobby. In that case, he failed and also succeeded in what he tried. He failed at guessing what his hobby was, but he succeeded in finding out what his real hobby was. I think successful people always try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. It helps people to try and be good at something you tried.', 'It also makes you learn what is right and what is wrong and makes you not make the mistake you did again when you do it again.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with this statement because (but I hope it will be true) there are a huge number of interests linked with the car industry and it will be improbably that in only twenty years something will change. First of all, I don't think that in a small time the technology will develop new kinds of movement systems and, more importantly, they will be secure for humans (like what happened in Germany with a new kind of train that was based on magnetic forces, a disaster, many people dead ). We must be sure!. Second, in my opinion, the owners of oil companies have invested a lot of money in industry that produces cars, so if these industries changed their standard of production, probably, a lot of them would close and a lot of people would be unemployed. Also if the oil runs  out , I am sure that all these rich people will find something else to maintain their control over the transportationorganization.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Are there differences in enjoyment in life compared with young people and those of whom are older at age? Well, I think that is a question that depends on the personality or different backgrounds in which the person came from. However, I do think that a younger person will have the advantage of enjoying and having fun in life because they have less to worry about. When a person becomes older they are more aware and warned of personal and social problems, at school, friendships , grades and so on. What I thought was the most difficult, while growing up to be a pre-teenager was that I had to conform with others and I had to use the right choice of words. When you are little you have limited thoughts of how your words may affect others and how you accept differences, but when you grow up, you may be discriminated against and discriminated against because of your skin color and the clothes you wear, or the way you look.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. However, others disagree. In my opinion, I think the former statement is true. This is because young people are energetic, brave, and courageous. Young people always have energy to do many things. For example, they will use their free time to hang out with their friends. They will go to some places to enjoy themselves as clubs, bars, and movie centers. Furthermore, young people are more attracted by the colourful world rather than staying at home. They are afraid of grounding because it is indispensable for them to have fun. In addition to being energetic, people who are young have the bold to enjoy their life.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Traveling is the best way to discover many places and areas around the world, and as you may know everyone should know the place where he or she lives. There are many people who like to travel , but they are those like to travel alone and others in a group. It depends on the traveler. Since a long time ago I have liked to travel in a group for many reasons. First, getting together with many friends makes the trip enjoyable with many things, such as discussion on different topics, giving ideas about the place where we are going to,. Second, I feel good taking a meal in a group ,I remember one day I traveled with my school friends to discover one of the most beautiful places in Morocco. It was to Atlas Mountains. I remember when we got to eat together in a great environment. Third, the most important thing is to have a guide, an expert for your tour, that's the only way to have several information in your mind during the trip, which remains the source of information. Finally, you will not know the importance of traveling in a group until you enjoy it with some sort of things that I mentioned above. that is one of the best things in life. Think about it !.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I am not completely sure about the agreement with the statement. The ideas and the conceps are at the basis of facts. The fact begins when a man decides to put in practice an idea or a concept, making it real. So if you want to know something you have to ask why he is doing this, what are the causes that are at the bottom of the decision that makes something real. On the other hand facts are necessary to know the consequences of the action of someone who decided to follow his ideas. Having to make a choice I think that the keyword is the verb understand. If someone really understands a concept, he is more acknowledged, he is more able to make his choices. the other who knows only the facts can say: the things went in that way, the things are there, but in reality he doesn`t know how and why. I can take some examples. In history I know that at that precise moment a precise thing happened. If I only know the facts i can`t understand the real reason at the base. In the end I can learn very little and have very minimal personal improvement. But if I know the causes, what makes people behave in that way, I can understand a lot, maybe learn from their errors. another example that it could be made is not quite directly related but is very similar.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I disagree with the statement that ideas and concepts are more important than facts for students. Actually from my point of view, facts are the same important just as ideas and concepts. First, without facts, how come the ideas and concepts? Ideas and concepts can not be separated from facts. For example, when we learn the concept of force in physics, students need to do experiments to be aware of the fact that there are different kinds of force everywhere in the world. The teacher will confuse the students if he or she just draws a symbol and points it at them, then says " Look, it is what we call force". By doing this, the teacher is at the rick of being fired.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: A number of people have argued that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help their communities. While the first reaction of some people may disagree with this statement, there are some compelling reasons to explore this issue in more depth. Concerning the status quo of today's society, I personally agree with this statement for the following two reasons. First, the atmosphere of competition is getting stronger in many fields, such as career or study. People treat educational degrees with more seriousness, and consequently, people are required to pursue higher degrees than in previous times. Nowadays, parents are aware of this change in society. As a result, they expect their children to pay exclusive attention to their studies, or specifically, to everything which is helpful to their education. Helping the communities simply turns into a waste-of-time behavior if it is not beneficial to the studies. In addition, the security problems also reduce people's willingness to help the communities. There are more crimes or robbery acts happening in the dark corner of the street all the time. Parents are worried about the children's safety, and as a consequence fewer and fewer parents or adults will encourage their children to hang out outside as long as the neighbourhood is alive with a signal of unsafty. there is one true example that happened to my mom. Last year she just walked home after work, she unfortunately robbed by a young man. Her bags were gone as well as some amount of money. My mother was terrifying, and she started warning me that I had to come home no later then six o'clockon any circumstances , and tried my best not to hang around the community because it was very dangerous.

While the first reaction of some people may disagree with this statement, there are some compelling reasons to explore this issue in more depth. First, the atmosphere of competition is getting stronger in many fields, such as career or study. People treat educational degrees with more seriousness, and consequently, people are required to pursue higher degrees than in previous times. Nowadays, parents are aware of this change in society. Her bags were gone as well as some amount of money.", "My mother was terrifying, and she started warning me that I had to come home no later then six o'clockon any circumstances , and tried my best not to hang around the community because it was very dangerous."]

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: It is commonly known that young people do enjoy life more than older people do. That is, in other words, age can sometimes be a hindrance towards living life to its fullest, and of course enjoying it to very far extents and dimensions. Nevertheless, i personally do not support and agree with this statement simply because the modern society lifestyle is not tied to age, old people do have more experience in life than younger people, and the spirit never gets old even though the body does. As a matter of fact, modern societies and modern lifestyles do not impose any age considerations as far as their activities are concerned. That is to say, old people can always do what is done by young people without being under the spotlight and focus, and no one finds it strange and odd when he finds them doing such activities. As an example, an old person can go and have a concert with his girl friend or wife till down without being someone exceptional. So, our open society leaves all doors open in the face of all people, whatever their age is. Secondly, I do think that old people ` s experiences in life do back them up in enjoying their life to its fullest in the sense that it allows them to have a good knowledge of how life can be lived and enjoyed more than young people. The difference between young and old people would be quite obvious if a comparison of how both parts enjoy their holidays is to be made. Thirdly, I do believe that human bodies do get old under the influence of time.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Some people claim that successful people only work hard, while others like me fully agree that success depends on trying and searching. The first point i would like to make is that there are strong advantages to working in the same way. One benefit of working in the same way is not becoming any risks. You won`t fall down. For instance, my father who is a mechanical mechanical engineer. He worked 30 years for one company so he had enough money and promotions. He started as a basic engineer and he became his promotions with his hard work. He didn ` t have any stress because the company doesn`t care about him he cares only abouthis work. Undoubtedly, not taking risks means a healthy, relaxed and safe life. Though there are strong advantages to working in the same way there are some even more compelling advantages for me to work with risks. When you take risks the income will be more. For example, I`m a mechanical engineer like my father but i want to have my own company so i can take more risks to make my company bigger. These risks will be enjoyable too because i like this lifestyle. More than that, i can learn a lot of things with my risks. The income will always be bigger with risks. In addition, without risks a person couldn`t be creative enough. With the help of stress our body has got more adrenalin which means more creativity and better work.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with the statement, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. There are so many cars which are invented, as the year passes by there are more people who havecars, and in our society we can not live without cars. There are so many cars which are invented and will continue to be invented for the future because every year people are born and that means more cars will be made. There are people who work for the car company, such as Sam Sung in Korea. Sam Sung mainly produces cars and everyday they are inventing a new car with new colors, design, and shapes. Each year people buy new cars because it attracts them and they do not keep their cars for many years. In a certain time they all change into new cars. If there are no people buying cars then the people who work for the car company will all lose their jobs. As the year passes by there are more people who have cars because everyone wants to have an independent car. As people grow older they all want to have their own car, house, and family.

What would happen if one gets ideas or concepts without knowing the facts? I think it will lead to the misconception of the people whom one doesn't know. Without knowing the facts, we are not able to know the truth. For example, if one sees black people ,without knowing the facts, if one follows the common ideas and concepts of the black people, one might think most of the black people are uneducated and theifs.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: It is more important for students to learn facts than to understand ideas and concepts. We need to first learn facts in order to get ideas and concepts. What would happen if one gets ideas or concepts without knowing the facts? I think it will lead to the misconception of the people whom one doesn't know. Without knowing the facts, we are not able to know the truth. For example, if one sees black people ,without knowing the facts, if one follows the common ideas and concepts of the black people, one might think most of the black people are uneducated and theifs. Or, if one sees Mexicans working on the construction site, one might think that they are all poor and uneducated. Or one might think all Asians are good at math or science, and they are all excellent in their schools. These are all misconceptions. People who don't know the facts could misunderstand the people around them. If one knows the facts first before understanding the concepts or ideas of the people, one can't just automatically put people in a certain category like that. Even though the person is working on the construction site, I know there are many people who are well educated and not poor. They just choose to work there. I know Asians who are not good at either math nor science.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There have been a lot of events from the past in Korea : the Korean war, the invasion from Japan, many political incidents, and so on. That's why the older generation has gone through roughly in Korea. However, the young generation has no problem living within our country these days without thinking of many problems the older generation has had. There are some evidences that show why I think young people enjoy life more than older people do. On a trip field, it is kind of boom for many young people in Korea to go to Europe for their travel recently. Not only Europe, but also many countries, such as the States, the U. K. , southern Asia, Latin America. The most important thing is that they go travelling with their money which is from their part-time job or their work. Whereas, there is no doubt that older people didn't usually go travelling abroad when they were younger. It's because they couldn't afford travelling abroad at that time, which doesn't mean that they didn't want to. Besides, development for flying abroad was not enough for them at that time. In other words, there were a few barriers for older people to travel abroad. As to the work as it concerned, while older people had to work 6 days a week from 9 a. m. to 8 p. m. , even more, the younger generation has "working for 5 days a week from 9 to 5" these days. They can even take a rest on Friday for some jobs. That's the reason why they can enjoy life on the weekends. They go shopping, go to a concert, go to a theatre, and go on a holiday. As well as there are lots of entertainments that they can enjoy. I would believe that many older people enjoy life more than they used to these days.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Learning is an important and difficult issue for students. First They have to understand what they should learn. Some people claim that learning ideas and concepts is very important and some other people agree that learning facts is exactly much more essential. I agree that learning ideas and concepts is much more important than learning facts in terms of forming more creative and responsive individuals. As I mentioned above learning ideas and concepts should become prior for students because the major aim of the learning is educating himself and increasing the information to make some sort of comparisons or to come up with results or new ideas. Therefore, learning facts is impossible for students and anyone, they have to create and form their own facts by combining the ideas and concepts that they learn.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The most fearful thing that people think of is death. Then, some people may say that young people have a lot of time to live compared to older people, therefore they can enjoy life more. It is sure that older people have a high possibility of death for various reasons, such as disease and weakness of their body. However, when death comes, it is unknown. Probably, a baby which was just born one hour ago may have died because of the sudden accident.
