However, when death comes, it is unknown.', 'Probably, a baby which was just born one hour ago may have died because of the sudden accident.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The most fearful thing that people think of is death. Then, some people may say that young people have a lot of time to live compared to older people, therefore they can enjoy life more. It is sure that older people have a high possibility of death for various reasons, such as disease and weakness of their body. However, when death comes, it is unknown. Probably, a baby which was just born one hour ago may have died because of the sudden accident. Therefore I disagree with the statement which is "Young people enjoy life more than older people do. "First, each person has a different situation and environment. These situations and environments have a great impact on a person's life. For example a lot of children die because of disease or lack of food in developing countries. Their lives are quite hard. They do not know if they can live tomorrow or not, because they do not have any money and food. They also have to work for their family at a young age, and sometimes, they sell their organs to get money. Young people are healthier than older people, therefore they have to earn money. Probably, most young people in these situations can not enjoy their life. Therefore it is not true that all young people enjoy life and are able to spend all their time on themselves. Second, older people in developed countries may have a lot of free time which they can use for their own. For example, in Japan, a lot of older people can get money from the government after the decided age. Therefore they do not have to work, and they use this free period to do their hobbies, such as sports, music, games. and so on. It is not true that all old people enjoy their lives, but it is true that a lot of old people enjoy their lives by arranging their future.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. If the advertisements fail to show the products' virtue, why do the manufacturers advertise their products every day? It is the basic function of the advertisement. Commercials are trying to exaggerate the virtue of products in two ways. First, using the characteristics of media. Television, newspapers, and magazines are adapting every possible visual effects in their advertisements in order to show the products brighter than they are. They use lighting and computer based image reprocessing techniques. There are lots of new techniques used in the advertisements that make it possible products can be seen as totally different styles and shapes.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Nobody can define what life is and what enjoyment is. Life and enjoyment both have different meanings for different individuals. A person may enjoy their whole life. But it is not possible to avoid the pains and sorrows from life, because these are part of everybody's life and come at different ages. Some pains are related to age, like physical problems. Some people face age problems early in their life and some people face problems late in life. Or we can say that some people become senile early, it depends on the situation which they faced in their life and it also depends on genetic factors also. I agree with this statement that " Young people enjoy life more than older people do". One reason to support this opinion is that undoubtedly the young person's energy level is higher than the older one's. Young people are more enthusiastic than older people and enthusiasm is a must to enjoy life. Older people's energy will decrease as their age will increase, this is a basic bilogical principle. A young person can travel and go wherever they want to go but it is not possible for an old age person because their body will not allow them to do so. Another reason is that the physical problems will restrict old people's activities, like they can't travel so frequently if they have a problem with jointpain. They can't eat what they want to eat most because their medical prescriptions will not allow them to do so. Old people can't take so much sugar in their food if they have the problem of diabetes. But a young person can easily eat what they want and they can easily digest it. They have no restrictions on their food. And taking food of our preference is also a joy of life or we can say enjoyment. A young person has no physical problems no joint problems so they can travel and go to adventures sites.
sents: ['Nobody can define what life is and what enjoyment is. Life and enjoyment both have different meanings for different individuals. A person may enjoy their whole life. But it is not possible to avoid the pains and sorrows from life, because these are part of everybody\'s life and come at different ages. Some pains are related to age, like physical problems. Some people face age problems early in their life and some people face problems late in life. Or we can say that some people become senile early, it depends on the situation which they faced in their life and it also depends on genetic factors also. I agree with this statement that " Young people enjoy life more than older people do". One reason to support this opinion is that undoubtedly the young person\'s energy level is higher than the older one\'s. Young people are more enthusiastic than older people and enthusiasm is a must to enjoy life. Older people\'s energy will decrease as their age will increase, this is a basic bilogical principle. A young person can travel and go wherever they want to go but it is not possible for an old age person because their body will not allow them to do so. Another reason is that the physical problems will restrict old people\'s activities, like they can\'t travel so frequently if they have a problem with jointpain. They can\'t eat what they want to eat most because their medical prescriptions will not allow them to do so. Old people can\'t take so much sugar in their food if they have the problem of diabetes. But a young person can easily eat what they want and they can easily digest it. They have no restrictions on their food. And taking food of our preference is also a joy of life or we can say enjoyment.', 'A young person has no physical problems no joint problems so they can travel and go to adventures sites.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We only live once, and for quite a short period of time. It is possible to divide life into two halves. The first half is from the birth to the age of forty, and I am sure you will guess the second one. The descending time follows the ascending time. But is reality so binary ? A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them. They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs.

A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them.', 'They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We only live once, and for quite a short period of time. It is possible to divide life into two halves. The first half is from the birth to the age of forty, and I am sure you will guess the second one. The descending time follows the ascending time. But is reality so binary ? A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them. They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs. They learn and improve their skills every single day while it is exactly the opposite for older people. Young people are able to love and not feel concerned by the problems the world faces : they do not even know what tomorrow will be made of ! Hopefully, older people have other sources of pleasure. Above all they have a lot of free time which they can use to do everything they want. They have no reason to doubt about their future, because it is behind them.

A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them. They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs. They learn and improve their skills every single day while it is exactly the opposite for older people. Young people are able to love and not feel concerned by the problems the world faces : they do not even know what tomorrow will be made of ! Hopefully, older people have other sources of pleasure. Above all they have a lot of free time which they can use to do everything they want.', 'They have no reason to doubt about their future, because it is behind them.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: For me , it is better to have a specialization in one specific subject than having broad knowledge of many academic subjects because it is easier for normal human study to one subject and spend one's time on it. People who prefer studying one language say they don't have time for that because there are many things in life that take up human's time. One reason that a human could have many social problems is that he is confused and not concentrating on his studies, so it is better for him to study one subject. Also studying one subject makes a human successful in what he is studying. For example, if a person studies business administration and spends all his time and energy on it he will become amazing in his career and job. If he had a little time he could take some courses in any thing he likes.
sents: ["For me , it is better to have a specialization in one specific subject than having broad knowledge of many academic subjects because it is easier for normal human study to one subject and spend one's time on it. title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: If I travel in a group, I will enjoy the travel a lot because the tour guide knows many good places to see. However, I disagree with this idea. In my opinion, planning the trip is also an enjoyable thing about travel. If I travel in a group, I will not search for the place where I am going and the memory will not last nor be vivid.
sents: ['If I travel in a group, I will enjoy the travel a lot because the tour guide knows many good places to see. However, I disagree with this idea. In my opinion, planning the trip is also an enjoyable thing about travel.', 'If I travel in a group, I will not search for the place where I am going and the memory will not last nor be vivid.']

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the statement "Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are". I think today companies are spending a lot of resources in order to have their products look better. I think there is only one reason to spend so much money to achieve a goal that should not be important to the customers. In fact, I think that, if people would think without any advertising , they would choose the product that has the best quality, and so companies that are not producing good quality products have only one solution, and the solution is to make people think their products are better than they really are. I am very interested in this issue; and so, in the last few years, I have studied a lot of marketing techniques in order to know what companies are doing in this field; however, I am also interested in being a good customer, so I want to try to avoid being a customer of a company that has a bad policy regarding marketing communication. I know that this is today quite difficult to achieve, but I feel that I really have to try it. Another reason, I want to argue for my idea, is linked with the quality of food we are eating today. In fact; today the people have an average of diseases much higher than it was several years ago. I think it is due to the quality of food we are eating, I am afraid that, despite this fact, people are still spending no more interest in order to know what they are eating. I also think the government should take some decisions in order to clarify the situation. The last reason, I would like to point out, is linked with the agricultural economic field.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I am inclined to agree with the statement that people who take risks and try something new rather then doing what they know make them successful. I have certain reasons to agress with this statement which I will discuss later in my essays. I would also like to highlight the fact that taking such risks might not get the success in the 1st attempt, sometimes people need to attempt multiple times. The main reason for this my view is that I believe in the "More risk, More gain" philosophy. If I decide to get into some new business/idea, which nobody has tried, I need comparatively more resources in terms of money, time and effort to pursue this new venture. There is a chance that this new venture could fail, but on the positive note if that business/idea succeeds , I would have a tremendous potential to make money in this new business as I will not have much competition. I will give an example of John Chambers, CEO of a networking company. This company was traditionally in the business of selling networking devices. As its business became more mature and competition increased , John decided to take some risks and expanded into the telephony business and became successful in this new business. This company ranks as number one in telephone business. The 2nd reason for my view is that unless I venture into unknown territories I will not know what lies there. As a human, we always have this comfort zone which we do not want to leave but there is no guarantee that there is no risk in what we are doing today. My brother has a gift business and he was very comfortable in that business. I insisted him to try exporting business, though he was initially reluctant but he tried and became successful. In conclusion, I believe that risk taking is a shirt cut to success which we should try.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: People cannot live without joy. Both young and old people look for something good for their lives. I am getting old. I want to say older people can enjoy their lives like young people do, however, it is difficult for older people to enjoy themselves like young people do.
sents: ['People cannot live without joy. Both young and old people look for something good for their lives. I am getting old.', 'I want to say older people can enjoy their lives like young people do, however, it is difficult for older people to enjoy themselves like young people do.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I strongly agree with the opinion that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. Some people say this society has lots of young people who help our communities and show some examples of articles in newspapers written about young people who help the community, but I think they are particular young people. Most young people do not spend their time helping their communities. It is real nowadays. Lots of young people are personalized people nowadays. They do not think about others' situations. The only thing they focused on was their own problem. Moreover, young people nowadays do not like activity or performance, rather like staying at home. At home, they play computer games or video games. They even communicate with their friends on line and not off-line. For example, they chat and do group homework via a messenger program on a computer. It is natural that these two boys do not like helping their communities. Helping communities needs lots of activity. Studying harder than in the past is one reason, too. Young people in the past were not depressed by studying.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Some people may think that successful people always try new things and take risks. Others may think that those people will only focus on what they already know how to do well. I believe that successful people will only do what they are already skilled at. It is because they know the reason why they are successful is because no one can replace their specialities. Moreover, doing what they are skilled at can prevent them from being lost. That a person has a job that no one can replace his or her position is a very important factor for a successful person. My father always told me that I have to find my interests, and become very skilled in that field. I totally believe those words because a successful person knows his interests and keeps studying them until he knows a lot about his interests. Take my professor for example, she is very good at translation. Thus, when some of the faculty members want to translate their books into English, they all ask my professor for help. They won't think about others. My professor can earn a lot of money by doing translation. Therefore, successful people will only do what they already know how to do because they know no one can replace them. Moreover, a successful person is successful because he does anything to prevent himself from being failed. Can a successful person still succeed when he is failed? I don't think so. For example, there was once a well-known company in my country. They were famous because they could produce nicely-looking computers. Every body liked to use their computer.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I agree with the statement as it says, the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. There are three advantages. First, as you travel in a group led by a tour guide, the tour guide will let you know every single thing you need to see on the journey. For example, if you want to go sightseeing, a tour guide will escort you to the sight. The tour guide will be responsible for whatever traveler wants to do. They just don' t have to worry about reserving a restaurant or doing some special activities. Especially when they cannot speak English or German or whatever the languages are spoken in the country where they travel to. Second, since going travelling with a group, they will definitely get along with each other and have fun. If traveling alone, you won't be able to have much fun as traveling with a group. Third, traveling on a gourp with a tour guide is much safer than traveling alone. Of course a tour guide knows about the location where it is not safe enough to go so they won't go to the dangerous side of the city. Ever since transportation has developed amagingly, the world is getting closer. We can go to another side of the world by airplane in ten hours or it may take a day to get there. It used to take about two, three months to get to other countries. The world is getting more dangerous, most people have guns and knives. so traveling with a tour guide is very helpful for the traveler. In my experiences, I have been to Australia on my own. It was still scary to go there by myself. Especially in the town centre. When I went to town, I lost my wallet. i didn't lose my passport, though.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Responsibility plays a big role in our life, especially for older people. when a young child is having fun and he doesn't care about money, home and issues that happen to any person. Young people think that they still have good health but when they get older their health will start to go down. I agree with young people who want to have more fun than older people for a couple of reasons. First of all, responsibility as I mentioned in the beginning, makes any person think about how to make his life more confident and never think about how to enjoy life except after finishing everything he wanted to do. For example in any family, the father always thinks about how to get money for his children, the mother looks after the children and tries to help her husband financially. If we look at the children, we can notice that they want to play everyday and have fun without thinking about anything. That was a good example of showing the difference in how young and old people act. The second reason is that old people always start to take care of their health which absolutely goes down as they get older. On the other hand, young people think about no responsibility and no problems with their health, so why don't they enjoy their lives before anything happens in the future. For example, if someone is 60 years old and he is retired from his job, he could have health problems and refuse him to enjoy his life.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I certainly dont agree with the statement "Young people enjoy life more than older people do". If a person wants to enjoy his/her life they can enjoy it no matter how old they are. Enjoying life doesnt depend on how old a person is, however; it depends on how the person is. being sociable, appreciating what you have, and having a positive way of thinking are all characteristics a person contains but it differs in people, what kind of person they are. Being a sociable person has a major affect on a person. If a person dislikes being around people then he / she wont be able to enjoy life because he/she is not seeing people from different cultures that entertain you. This unsociable person would end up being alone not wanting to interact with the outside world. One of the major reasons that would make a person enjoy his life is appreciating what he/she has. If a person does not do so he wouldn't be living that of a nice life. For example: If a poor girl is friends with a rich girl and this poor girl wants to wear and have what the rich girl has, that is a big problem because the girl would not be able to afford certain things. By not appreciating what she has she would suffer alot and wouldn't really enjoy life. If a person wants to really enjoy life he/she would no matter who he/she really was.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are the most used form of transport known nowadays will that change in twenty years? it is very hard to answer. In developed countries nearly everyone over a certain age has a car, alot of people use it on a daily basis: to go to work, shopping, travelling and in theirleisure time. I use the car everyday and i cannot imagine life with out it and because of that i think that there will be more cars rather than fewer in twenty years. You can argue that: Petrol is running out!. Everyone knows that, everyone is aware yet not many know what is going to happen with its price. In twenty years i believe that prices are going to increase, fewer people are going to be able to pay that price, people on shorter incomes will have to use other ways to get around and therefore the number of cars will be expected to decrease because people wont be able to pay the price but the problem is that there are other fuels that can be used and people will get used to having cars which are slower and less comfortable.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: In general,it is better to have both the tasks i. e. ,Broad knowledge of many academic subjects and also specialization in particular subjects. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Nowadays, the most used way to get around is by car. From the eighteenth century when the first car was produced, many changes have occurred in the car market and in the ways to use this kind of transport. Since the past, people have needed to move from one place to another place. For this reason some kinds of transport have beeninvented, for example train, bus, airplane and car. The growth of cities made the need for people to find a way to get around the city in an easy way, so they can get to work or to school, for that, personal transport is needed and the car is a personal one. Thus even more people bought cars to move. Nevertheless cars produce a lot of pollution that contributes to damage to the atmosphere in which we live. But at the present day, there is much more awareness about this problem, so many people are finding some ways to reduce the use of cars, for example using carpooling, or using public transport. In conclusion, at the present day there are a lot of cars that produce a lot of pollution, but I think that man is more conscious of this problem now than he was in the past, so i think that there will be fewer cars in twenty.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: These days, many technology systems are developed. For example, we could play in many ways these days like playing an X-box in their houses and going to the movie theatre. On the other hand, old people might not have a chance to play or watch the movie at the theatre with their friends. Not only playing to enjoy life, we could also find our new jobs easily and find their habits easily through the internet explorer. First of all, many young people these days play X-box in their house. Probably in the old days, they just played outside of sports like basketball or soccer. However, these days, we can play soccer or basketball in our house using an X-box. The new technology systems affect us in many ways. For example, we are allowed to talk to someone anywhere and at any time we want. By calling or e-mailing each other, we could find an enjoyable life. In addition, many young people these days also go to the movie theatre to watch the movies. In the movie theatre, we could choose the movie we want to watch. For instance, scary movies and sad movies. By watching them we could have a fun time in our spare time. Also while we watch the movie we can also eat any foods we want. In the old days, they didn't have any movies, so probably they all watched the news all the time.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Life is not merely breathing but experiencing the new adventures that every day brings. Energy and desire are the two main components young people experience when accomplishing their short or long term goals which keep them happier than grown-ups. Despite the common thought about retirement to enjoy life, recent studies show that 99% of old people do not enjoy life like younger people. The first group have got what they were looking for in their lives: a family , a beautiful house, enough money in the bank, among other things. Besides, it is a shame that getting the retirement they do not have time to travel to, to be attentive to some interesting things just because of health problems. They have to go and come to the doctor's surgery, spending their money on paying refills for their medical prescriptions. By contrast, younger people have energy , desire and many new goals to accomplish. Even though they seem to be very busy they are really happy because every day brings something exceptional to their lives and it has to do with their happiness. In conclusion, being younger means having energy , desire to achieve long term, short term goals which makes you enjoy life, more than older people. To experience new things every day, that gives happiness and relief. Definitely it is more exciting than being old and having just retired and stopping doing great and exciting things just because you have got old and you have already accomplished the mission you are here for.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: In the world, we can see many advertisements appearing on the television, in magazines, on the radio, and in newspapers. When people see the advertisements on the TV, in magazines, on the radio or in the newspaper, we can see the color is more beautiful than the product is. Also it can let many people know about the product and to buy it , but people don't know whether the product is good or bad. First of all, it can make products more beautiful than before, but this is not the true color, it can make people make mistakes about the color. If i saw clothes on the TV, maybe sometimes i feel happy that the color is very nice. I know, some workers use light or a computer to make it. we can choose the best color and let it appear on TV. So, the first thing is to make the color more beautiful. Second , i think it can make something better than the product really is. For example, we usually see a second hand car on the TV and buy it. If people see the car just on the computer or TV. We can't buy that. Some cars are a lemon. We need to go to the place and try to drive it. You can know whether a car is good or bad only through experiment. So, advertisements make cars much better than they really are. The third reason is that it can let many people know and buy it. Some drinks or food made advertisements, we saw the drinks and food were delicious, but the company didn't say how much fat they contained. Some food is not helpful for people's health. The company's purpose is to get many people to buy the products. So, they just say good things about people. Finally, i say i agree that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. I hope people who want to buy something go to that place and make sure that things are what you want to buy.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. I agree with the following statement. I think that trying new things is good for the world and helps us to do better and have a better life. People who know about one topic want to change what they know. For example, scientists already know a lot of things about the diseases but they are still struggling to give us a better life and a better chance to stay alive. title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Personally, I do prefer to travel by myself. Traveling with a group has limitations that I think reduce your experiences in a place you have never been to before. Everytime a person is led by a guide, his preferences or opinions are more likely to be affected by other people 's opinions and, also are predeterminated by a person that already has a point of view based on his own experiences. When a person travels on his own, the only way to enjoy the travel is to always be aware of the world around you, because it is a new place and your senses are open to any movement. It is exciting because if you don't take care of the things around you, bad experiences will happen easily. From this perspective, there is not doubt that traveling in groups is much better.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In my opinion,according to the statistics in the past decade immigration to the big cities from suburban areas is rapidly growing. I think that cars have become more popular released with this city lifestyle. Meanwhile number of big metropolitians is increasing year by year. I would like to draw attention to the reasons for immigration such as the huge potential of unemployment,not enough support for agriculture and farmers,a huge gap between urban and suburban areas' education system across the country. So in big cities personnel cars have become a requirement for those people. As i mentioned before living in a big city forces you to have a car to do everything you want in this lifestyle. Besides it also accounts for traffic jams and big crowds in cities that make people unable to live in. On the other hand there are different kinds of public transportation. In developed countries we can perceive widespread usage of public transportation. But if we look at the developing countries personal car usage is higher because of insufficent public transport systems. For example, Istanbul is the biggest city in Turkey ; since last year i have not driven to work because there is always an enormous traffic jam on highways Do you think it would probably change? No i do not think so.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There are some reasons to believe that young people enjoy life more than older people do but, personally, i think that nowadays it isn't so. In my opinion young people want to enjoy their life but they want a lot of things and the result is that they never feel happy. On the other hand old people, actually not very older, have a good experience of enjoying their life with a lot of things. I believe this because they have a lot of possibilities, such as more free time than young people and more money. I think that in this society money is very important for everything because it helps you to enjoy your life. For example you can go on holiday where youwant. Instead young people can't because they need an allowance from parents and they must go to school. So they can't go on holiday where they want. Also this topic depends on the behaviour of people because there are a lot of different characters. In my experience i'm sure that my life is more interesting today than when i was very young.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: i do agree with the statement. in today's fast moving world everybody wants to step ahead. everybody wants success and to make progress. young people are so busy with their studies that they forget their responsibility towards their community. They are so busy studying that they have no time leftover for extra activities. they were our parents and grandparents who used to do this job perfectly. if not, young people are busy with their college, classes, homework and everything. and if they are not busy with their friends, movies, partners,or just freeking out and having fun and enjoying their days, forgetting about their duty towards their community. this is something called GENERATION GAP. they are now no longer interested in doing such social work. they find it boring and a waste of time. we should all take some measures towards it to try to explain to the young generation that helping our community is so very important. we should offer a helping hand and do something beneficial for them. we should not only help our community but also our friends family and all who need us who needour help.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Learning about things different from thing s isthe basis of our society. Because if everyone specialized themselves in one subject only one academic subject would be difficult for us to discuss together in general subjects. In our society there are continuing changes, we need specialized people who can well understand topics in their favourite academic subjects. Nobody can understand all problems in all subjects and find solutions for those problems, we need experts for that. For example we are not able to explain how the financial policy of a multinational can affect the company'sprofits. But the people who are able to explain that, maybe not able to explain how education can reduce violence in poor countries. These experts are, I think, the ones able to teach their knowledge. It's important that this knowledge doesn't begin as a sort of integrism. Even if we are specialized in a subject it's important to understand other people's point of view. The fact that our society is in a permanent changing put an other problem on the table. What happened to people specializing on a topic that became old fashioned? Do these people have lost all their skills? What can they do now? The key is that people should be able to work, learn and think about other subjects.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We can consider life as a huge playing area where there are so many both dangerous and good things and where sometimes,we are not able to do everything because we are limited. If we take the case of enjoying life,there is a huge contrast between the way old people enjoy life and young people do. Young people,for instance, a child would be the happiest person ever,if her mother buys her the candy she wants yet an old person would be the happiest person ever if she sees her children,coming to visit her,calling her or going somewhere peaceful maybe. As all of us know, it is inevitable that young people are not as experienced as old people so that they dare more and they behave more freely. The older one gets,the less he or she enjoys life.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Mankind always needs success to reach good life standards therefore success is a very important aspect of humanlife. Everybody has different points of view about the idea of success. Some assume that, successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well, contrary to some think that successful people should only do what they already know how to do well rather than try new things and take risks. I personally agree with the first idea. These are the following reasons. Firstly, people should find their best way. Everybody who contains also successful people always tries new things. Their solutions are good or bad. Therefore, people find a way which is the best way for our life. For example, my father is a business man and he is very successful. Furthermore, he is always always interested in sport and he decided to buy a company about sport so he took a risk. However, now he is more successful than last. In addition to this, taking risks is amazing. I like taking risks so much because I believe that surprising solutions make life more enjoyable and enjoyable.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars were first introduced at the beginning of the last century. Ever since it has replaced the horse and carriage in most of the globe. The number of cars is on a frequent increase. I do not see in the future or the next twenty years that the number of cars will drop. As a machine,the car has proven to be indispensable. It is very hard to imagine our lives without cars. Thus with the increase in the world population and the idea that everybody needs a car then I do not see that in the next twenty years that there will be a drop in the number of cars. Car polling is a subject being discussed every where in the world. It is absolutely essential to decrease the number of cars on the streets. This will eventually make the flow of cars in the streets smoother and easier. As good as a dream, this will only make driving your car less of a hassle but will not decrease the number of cars. I remember when my father was driving me to school. I was only six years old.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I do not agree that Young people enjoy life more than older people do. I can not support this idea for two interesting reasons. First of all, young people have less free time than old people do. Think about the development stages of a human life chronically. When they are students, every day is full of something to do mandatarily such as homework, tutorials, lessons. Also young parents are so hectic almost everyday earning money, working house chores, taking care of children and being social to survive the difficulties which come into their lives. Just during the holidays they can relax and enjoy some time, then they have to struggle again after those certain times. It is hard even to think of themselves and their lives for a short time. On the contrary, old folks are quite often seen taking a walk, reading substantial books, playing golf, cruising on a beautiful ship and so on. Second, young people have less money than old people do. Actually young group makes a lot more money than the other one.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The distinct difference between young people and older people does not exist and to make this distinction is difficult. Also, deciding which is more enjoyable is a more complex issue. Young people are more energetic and full of dreams, while older people are at ease and satisfied, although such differences depend on the situations of their abilities and lives. I will take the position that older people enjoy life more than younger people, and discuss it below. The most important characteristics of older people are money and time. Most successful people have a lot of money and a lot of time in their everyday lives. Even younger people such as famous entrepreneurs are wealthy but they must be busy and have a rare time to enjoy their time leisurely.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Humans have always been against risky situations, but those who have abandoned their fears have, at least, succeeded. So, I think that the spirit of fighting against yourself is one of the most important qualities you could have. First of all, if you don't progress, you will always be at the same level, you won't reach higher positions. Unless, you are happy with this situation, this won't be a problem, but in my case this would be a disaster, because I always think the way of getting better until perfection and I think that is the feeling that moves the world. You only have to remember every morning that if it hadn't been for Cristobal Columbus, that decided to take a new route to the West Indians, probably now we would not be learning English. Second, if you get used to doing some process or task that everybody is able to do, then you become one of them. But in the moment that somebody appears who could do it better than you, then you get replaced. You are dismissed.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Technology has been improved so much in the past decades, solving all sorts of problems that we had, and still keep developing. Even though technology is fast improving, there are major problems remaining which are the increase in cars that pollute our environment. I cast doubt on the claim that twenty years is too short a time to solve the problem. First, the speed of development in technology is unbelievably fast. No one thought that they could talk to each other and see each other at the same time with the wireless phone. However, with technology so far, we will only be able to create other cars such as flying cars or cars that can go under the water. This could not be the solution as the number of cars will be the same as now or even more. It would be a great improvement but would not help the problem of pollution caused by cars. Secondly, in the last twenty years there has been a dramatic difference in transfer matters, I believe that twenty years is too short a time to think about whether the number of cars will decrease. I strongly believe that one day it will; however with the technology we have at the moment, we can not solve this problem. In conclusion, we are having pollution problems because of an increasing number of cars such as air pollution and nose pollution.

This could not be the solution as the number of cars will be the same as now or even more. It would be a great improvement but would not help the problem of pollution caused by cars. Secondly, in the last twenty years there has been a dramatic difference in transfer matters, I believe that twenty years is too short a time to think about whether the number of cars will decrease. I strongly believe that one day it will; however with the technology we have at the moment, we can not solve this problem. In conclusion, we are having pollution problems because of an increasing number of cars such as air pollution and nose pollution.', 'With technology keeping developing, one day the amount of cars will decrease or even disappear by using new ways of transport.']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Education is more and more important to everyone in the world now, but different people have different points of views on what is more important for students. Some people think that understanding ideas is more important, but there is also a group of people who think that it shouldn't be like that, Learning facts is more important than understanding ideas.
sents: ['Education is more and more important to everyone in the world now, but different people have different points of views on what is more important for students.', "Some people think that understanding ideas is more important, but there is also a group of people who think that it shouldn't be like that, Learning facts is more important than understanding ideas."]

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I agree with the statement that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. First, according to the improvement of public transportation such as, train, bus and so forth, it would not be necessary to have a car privately. The city I live in has various kinds of public transportation, such as buses, tubes, trains. I do not feel any need to have cars. It is true there are lots of cities that do not have the infrastructure of public transportation adequately in quality and quantity. But according to the improvement of public transportation in twenty years, the need for owning cars will be decreased. Some people may want to have a car for their joy despite the improvement of public transportation. However considering the item I discuss in the succeedingparagraph, people who think they want to have cars for their joys will change their minds. Second, we have to take advantage of natural resources more and more effectively in the future. In that sense, we should not use and own cars privately. The decrease in natural resources including crude oils has been and will have been a. serious problem. Of course, the more we consume natural resources as time goes by, the more serious our problem will become. These serious problems may result in war seeking natural resources as we can watch on TV.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Nowadays, education is one of the most important things in our lives. In schools, teachers teach students some concepts which are related to the course. However, in their whole life, people use not only these concepts but also individual experiences. It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. I strongly disagree with this statement.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. First of all, there are many active, fresh, lively older people. They have many hobbies, friends, family, so they are enjoying their life. Some older people look so young! My grandfather is also one of these people.
sents: ['I disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. First of all, there are many active, fresh, lively older people. They have many hobbies, friends, family, so they are enjoying their life.', 'Some older people look so young! My grandfather is also one of these people.']

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: The author says that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. In my opinion,i prefer travelling alone than travelling with a group of people.
sents: ['The author says that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.', 'In my opinion,i prefer travelling alone than travelling with a group of people.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Life was a box of chocolates, you'll never know what you are going to get. Yes, I start my essay with this famous sentence. I always consider life is a period of unexpecting experience. No matter whether we like the situation you're in or not, we should accept it; no matter whether we were young or old, we could not escape any of those experiences. My point of view is that we could enjoy it, with a grateful heart, seriously and hopefully. When I was young, I began to learn dance when I was four. I should practise everyday after class. I not only received numerous awards in the dancing competition, but also gained much more joy compared to my peers. I have a vivid childhood. When I grow up gradually, I still like my life full of colorful experiences. I never give up on different kinds of things, either for entertainment or for serious academic subjects. My interdisciplinary research includes economics, journalism and political science, much more broader and deeper than others. I'm content with my life pattern, I believe I enjoy my life more than the generation older than me, such as my parents. My parents are almost fifty years old now.

My point of view is that we could enjoy it, with a grateful heart, seriously and hopefully. When I was young, I began to learn dance when I was four. I should practise everyday after class. I not only received numerous awards in the dancing competition, but also gained much more joy compared to my peers. I have a vivid childhood. My interdisciplinary research includes economics, journalism and political science, much more broader and deeper than others. I'm content with my life pattern, I believe I enjoy my life more than the generation older than me, such as my parents.", 'My parents are almost fifty years old now.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I both agree and disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. Although young people have more chances to explore the world than old people do, they also have more opportunities to face frustration than elderly people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. My parents always tell me that "go explore the outside world when you are still young". Young people only have one advantage and it is their young age because they do not have any wealth and experience.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. An advertisement can use all of the five physical human senses, but the advertisements people normally experience are visual and auditory. The simplest and the most common form of advertisement is the visual form, such as advertisements in magazines, newspapers, and the ones on billboards. When concentrating on the visual effect, the advertisement needs an aesthetic, or visual impact which could grab a potential customer by a glance, or a message motivating the reader to buy the product. The advertisement may appeal to the reader by highlighting the efficiency, advantage, uniqueness of the product. However, for every advertisement, the quintessential motto is : buy me. In order to attract the reader, an advertisement at times uses the effects of eye-grasping exaggeration. With such aesthetically alluring visual pictures -with the help of modern technology, photography, or literature , an advertisement nearly blinds the reader depending on the reader's class, culture, or sex.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I think it is a very positive point of view and i completely support it. Only lazy people sit on what they have, and look where they are at. I think that you do not lose any thing except a little bit of money by trying new things. What I mean is that you actually have a lot of chances to fail but if you succeed you can make a lot of money and that is how people see you. I would have to take for example Mr. Bill Gates who has tried to revolutionize computers and as a result he is the wealthiest person on the planet. I could also take my mother as an example, everytime she tries a new recipe , it is not always good but this way she gets better.

I think that you do not lose any thing except a little bit of money by trying new things. What I mean is that you actually have a lot of chances to fail but if you succeed you can make a lot of money and that is how people see you. I would have to take for example Mr. Bill Gates who has tried to revolutionize computers and as a result he is the wealthiest person on the planet.', 'I could also take my mother as an example, everytime she tries a new recipe , it is not always good but this way she gets better.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with this statement of course. Nowadays young people are not involved in helping their own community. For me the problem is young people's education and our modern way of life. In fact in modern society the most important thing is success , and the first thing that is related to this is certainly the idea of competition. Since we were children everyone (parents, relatives, friends, teachers) has taught us that the only thing that is important is to be the best. A good example is a football match where for everyone the only goal is victory, and participation and meeting with other people is not important. So we tend to see our social life in this way too. We don't have to help the community where we live, we only have to fight against the others and try to be the best one.

Since we were children everyone (parents, relatives, friends, teachers) has taught us that the only thing that is important is to be the best. A good example is a football match where for everyone the only goal is victory, and participation and meeting with other people is not important. So we tend to see our social life in this way too.", "We don't have to help the community where we live, we only have to fight against the others and try to be the best one."]

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: In my opinion, there could be great success for people who have an inclination to do things differently from others. Although some might say such people tend to have failure because of the high risk, I think that most of them have success in terms of their personal achievements. I prefer the idea that people should try to do their best within their ability and resources. And, even if they fail, I think they have had their own success. This success means that breaking our own limitations could be happiness for people. For example, there was a man, who quit a big company and started a small coffee shop. Even though he was so enthusiastic about making the shop profitable, he eventually went bankrupt.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Yes, I do agree with the statement stated below. Having broad knowledge of many subjects is better than having knowledge in one subject. Because, every subject in the academic year is related to the other subjects. As we know, MATHEMATICS is the father of all subjects. It has a major influence on all other subjects. There is no such subject which does not have an influence on it. having a knowledge of it only one can have the knowledge of the other subjects completely. For example, in our Bachelor's degree, we have the subjects MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS and WIRELESS COMMUNICATIONS. Each have the influence on the other. Mobile communication is the study of the science of wireless transmissions, whereas wireless transmission is the path for the mobile transmission.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In my opinion it is more important for students to understand concepts than to study or learn the facts pertaining to the subjects. I have experienced a lot of problems with this matter in my childhood days when i usually concentrated more on the facts than ideas and concepts. One such experience occurred in my tenth class where i usually learn facts about my subjects such as physics,social studies,mathematics before exams. By the time, I am ready to write the exam i usually forget most of the answers or facts which i learned earlier and get less marks in the exam. My friend of mine on the contrary, usually concentrates on ideas and concepts in physics,social subjects and he is able to reproduce successfully what he learned in exams without any trouble. Another experience i faced was when i was writing the entrance exam for an Engineering course,where i concentrated more on formulas and principles related to mathematics and did not concentrate on ideas and concepts. Due to tension in the exam i was unable to recall the formulas that i learned and ended up with a low score in the exam. However for undergraduate students it is not necessary to understand ideas and concepts pertaining to their subjects because the undergraduate course is four years so it is hard to remember ideas and concepts for various subjects. Instead they must remember only facts except their favourite subject , where they are going to do research in a graduate course.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with that statement. because young people have more power than older people but they have no experience. and young people do not know how to use their energy wisely. so they behave according to what they want to do. Most of that is playing. but i'm not sure that playing out side, dancing and playing video games are enjoying their life. There's few people that work hard to enjoy their life. Young people do not have to work to earn money, they only know about spending money.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Nowadays, the advertisements play such an important role in the marketing of the product even if the product is bad for the consumer or if it has bad quality. The advertisements make the products look good, thats why the advertisements are created, and to induce the customer to buy the product. The advertisements are a way to persuade people to buy things that other people do. Everything is about fashion nowadays and thats why people are accustomed to buying things that are commonly used by all people, like a new pair of shoes or a new cellphone model. The advertisements appear everywhere people go because the industries want to make their product well known in the area where they are doing the campaign. An example of products that use alot of marketing are all the soda industries. Like Coca Cola or Pepsi both of these businesses use lots of advertisements that say that their product is better than the other. Another example of this is the tobacco industry, because the advertisements that they do of cigarettes tell people that they should smoke and they dont tell that the product is harmful to health. The advertisements are every where like on the radio, on  the Internet and in cars that are carrying product stickers or models with the product. But all the time the advertisements make the product look really good even though the product is bad or harmful to your health. The industries only care about selling they dont care about the quality of the product, an example of this is the products that say that they can stop hair loss These products have such advertisements that some people fall in their tails to buy them even if the hair loss continues there is only a waste of money and time. But the advertisements improve the appearance of the appearance of the product.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: When we look from the past to nowadays, we will discover a lot of successful people. These people have mostly spent a lot of time trying new stuff and experiencing new things,and that is why these people can succeed. Therefore, a lot of the time, it is true that successful people are those who try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. People who try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well often succeed. These people often work really hard to find new stuff and new ideas. People who want to succeed often need to take risks in order to succeed. Although they might not end up living with good respect or beliefs from other people, their successes are undoubtable. For instance, one of the famous scientists who had exclaimed that the earth is round ended up in jail for a while, but his successful career is now no doubt that his theory was right. Therefore, people who are able to try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know what to do well often succeed. On the other hand, people who do not try new things and take risks but only doing what they already know how to do well do not often succeed. If a person does not try new things and discovers new things, one will only be a professional in one's field. Meanwhile, that person would be a really tiny chance to find new things like those who succeed. For example, if a smart student is good at science but he does not try to find any new thing in science, he might only be a good teacher or professor in his field, but instead of being a successful person who finds new things.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Although many people say that we will not use cars anymore in the future, cars will still be necessary tools even in the future. Namely. cars will still prevail. For this purpose, I don't agree that there will be fewer cars in twenty years. Here comes discussion. In the first place, Cars are great inventions. There are a variety of them and they help us a lot; for example, transportation- both humans and cargoes. Besides, they save time. We benefit from cars very much. Undeniably, convenient as cars contribute, we can not ignore the negative impact they have ; say, the exhaust and energy consumption. However, scientists are now trying to figure out some alternative solutions such as biodiesel. Using biological sources, cars will not cause environmental problems. Since new technology has been developing at a breathtaking speed, I am optimistic about the future. In my opinion, cars will exist, maybe changing into another form, but they will always exist. After all, we can't live in a world with cars.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with the statement that students should understand ideas and concepts rather than learning facts. Understanding ideas and concepts is important for students to acquire knowledge. Once the Student gets an idea of the concept he can easily understand the facts. Let us take an example regarding this statement. suppose a student has a brief idea of politics then he can understand what is going on in the present world and presentcountry. He can even describe how it is going on and what is wrong and right. I state that understanding the concept is the main criteria of the subject or lecture. If a student understands a concept thoroughly he can score good marks and he never forgets that concept and ideas in his life time. This is the way of a student to develop his thinking and he can easily grasp the facts going around. Ideas and concepts play an important role in the present education system and present world. Suppose a person has nill knowledge about politics it is difficult for him to understand the facts going around. If he does nt know what the concept of work and energy he cant understand the ordinary day to day activities. Let us take english if a student does nt know the language and alphabets of english it is difficult for him to learn grammarand spellings. If a person has nill knowledge about a topic he cant write an essay. Concepts and facts are very important in all acepts. If he just learns facts he gets half knowledge of the concept. He can understand only a part of the theory not totally and completely. So i conclude that ideas and concepts play an important role in understanding facts. "As a great philosopher said, half knowledge is always dangerous. ".

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: The media of today is a very powerful tool. In other words the media is the king of the world. Whatever is shown in the television, in the newspapers and in the magazines is greatly influencing the public. Children and even some adults get carried away by their tactics. The influence may be negative or positive. I believe that they sometimes mislead people. Thus i completely agree that the advertisements make the products seem much better than they are. Adversitements that are in forms of writing on paper or those seen visually on the television are very different from those that they actually show or tell us. Firstly the products shown in these advertisements are not what they actually show us. Lets take the example of medicines. The advertisements in a mere ten to fifteen seconds try to explain to us what it should be taken and what it should be avoided. They may inform us that they do wonders for , like lets take an example of a patient with some heart disease. They may tell us that they can help cure or treat high cholesterol in just one month and also tell us that you don't need to follow a diet. But scientifically how can a high cholesterol be cured in a month and that without having a diet?Thus i believe that these can be misleading Sometimes they may tell us that any kind of skin problem be it on the face or any other part of the body can be taken care of. They may use the words like " magical cream ". The patients may believe them. They may use them but in vane. Actually this is just a tactic they follow to fool us. Lets take another example of a " hair remover cream ". The advertisements may show a beautiful girl with no hair on her face or legs. She would say. " for a silky skin like mine use so and so cream ". The irony is that they already have a girl who had no hair on her face or legs. So they are not trying to mislead people.
sents: ['The media of today is a very powerful tool. In other words the media is the king of the world. Whatever is shown in the television, in the newspapers and in the magazines is greatly influencing the public. Children and even some adults get carried away by their tactics. The influence may be negative or positive. I believe that they sometimes mislead people. Thus i completely agree that the advertisements make the products seem much better than they are. Adversitements that are in forms of writing on paper or those seen visually on the television are very different from those that they actually show or tell us. Firstly the products shown in these advertisements are not what they actually show us. Lets take the example of medicines. The advertisements in a mere ten to fifteen seconds try to explain to us what it should be taken and what it should be avoided. They may inform us that they do wonders for , like lets take an example of a patient with some heart disease. They may tell us that they can help cure or treat high cholesterol in just one month and also tell us that you don\'t need to follow a diet. But scientifically how can a high cholesterol be cured in a month and that without having a diet?Thus i believe that these can be misleading Sometimes they may tell us that any kind of skin problem be it on the face or any other part of the body can be taken care of. They may use the words like " magical cream ". The patients may believe them. They may use them but in vane. Actually this is just a tactic they follow to fool us. Lets take another example of a " hair remover cream ". The advertisements may show a beautiful girl with no hair on her face or legs. She would say. " for a silky skin like mine use so and so cream ". The irony is that they already have a girl who had no hair on her face or legs.', 'So they are not trying to mislead people.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I have two opinions on this question that I will develop. Firstly, I think that it is possible that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than today. In fact, today we have an important life problem which is the ecologicalproblem. As the climate is changing and the earth is warming, a lot of people consider, nowadays, that cars pollute and to put an end to the warming process, we have to use no polluting vehicles like bicycles,. This kind of mentality is more current in the north of europe (Sweden, Finland,. ). In those countries, they already use fewer cars than a few years ago and prefer using buses or other public transport. Moreover, in France, we can notice that the cost of petrol is very important and we arrive at a point where we can say that it's a luxury to have a car as petrol is expensive. We can imagine if nothing happens that people will develop the North mentality and apply it, to make benefits or just economies. And definitely, the number of cars will decrease. But in an other part I think that it's not possible that in twenty years there will be fewer cars than today. In fact, I imagine that from today to 2026 cars won't work with petrol but I hope with hydrogen, water or electricity or sunlight which will permit us to resolve the ecological problem we have to face. Changing the mod of combustion will permit us to have something cheaper than petrol so consequently, there will be more cars in twenty years. Finally we have to realise that in twenty years, there will be more than 7 trillion people on earth so normally the car number on earth will grow.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I don't believe there will be fewer cars in the next twenty years. Cars are the most efficient means of transportation because they's cheap, fast enough and we use them for our daily life. I guess no body can live without using the car in his daily transportation. Although the market for cars has grown much more than before, we can see more luxury , economical and comfortable cars. Although scientists are looking for another way to treat the car rather than oil. They are now having their experiment on sun power and Hydrojen and a lot of these experiments have been successful. Besides, the oil market is growing as well and there are a lot of reservations for oil for the next 40 and 60 years. Cars are important in our daily life , we use them to go to work , travel, construction and entertainment as well. I believe that cars will be different from now maybe flying cars or diving cars, and maybe we will use our car to travel in the air instead of airplanes and no need to bother ourselves about finding a reservation and the crowds of people at the airport.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people. Young people look at the world in a different way when compared to older people. Young people have the opportunity to mould their life in the way they want. I feel that young people are persistent and are more confident. Young people look on the world as a sphere containing numerous opportunities. They have the tendency to prepare for the future and achieve their goals through hard work. Young people are more energetic unlike older people. This helps young people to fulfill their goals. For instance, a boy at seventeen can aspire to become a pilot and even accomplish it through his hardwork and energy. This may be difficult for older people because the response to any kind of situation like moving the accelerator hard reduces with the passage of time. Moreover,young people are more persistent. They think that they should respect their elders and should not hurt their feelings in any way. On the other hand,older people need not respect their younger ones and have the right to behave as they wish.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: From my point of view, this statement is not to support. There are some significant reasons to reduce the use of cars, for instance the environmental costs through pollution, the expenses in general for the car owner likefuel etc. But I strongly believe, that even if the natural resources are running out and the prices of fuel will continue to rise, and even if we pollute the air and do not do ourselves a favour, I believe that mankind will not use cars less, as long there are any cars available. And this opinion has many reasons. The people today do not often care about the world tomorrow, they just live in the presence, in the time of comfort and waste. People want to be independant, they do not want to wait somewhere at the busstation, being ruled by a scheduled arrival and departure. Using the car is often the most comfortable and fastest way to get somewhere, especially to a workplace. Often it saves time taking the car rather than for example the train. Nowadays we are too individualistic, we also want to have our own private space, and often prefer to drive somewhere just by ourselves quietly and relaxed, than having chatting people around us that could disturb our peaceful moment in the car. Having and using a car also has many practical reasons. If you go somewhere for shopping for example, your car is able to store a lot, you do not have to carry heavy bags around. Especially for a family, having cars is an enormous importance. It is more pleasant for a mother to have your children close by you in your car, than using public transport , which would only cause stress and bring your children into danger.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Have you ever bought any items that you didn't have a serious need to use? If you have experienced this case, It is because of a drastic advertisement. People who live in the modern world are members of capitalist societies. An advertisement has the role of making consumers buy its product. So, I think that advertisements usually make people overestimate the prices of products. It is because of the purpose of advertisements, the models of advertisements, and the indirect features of advertisements. First of all, I think the purpose of advertisements is the important reason to make people misjudge products. The roles of advertisements are to urge consumers to buy everything the companies sell. In order to fulfill their goals, companies are going to do whatever they can do. Therefore, most companies merely want to emphasize the good aspects of their products. As a result, products look better than they practically are. Secondly, I believe that the models of advertisements make products look much better. Usually, most advertisements tend to hire famous stars, sports players, and any super stars as their models. People can believe whatever super stars say in advertisements because superstars start so famous that people regard them as reliable humans.

It is because of the purpose of advertisements, the models of advertisements, and the indirect features of advertisements. First of all, I think the purpose of advertisements is the important reason to make people misjudge products. The roles of advertisements are to urge consumers to buy everything the companies sell. title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Schools that teach k-12 students require students to study various subjects. These subjects that the students learn are not necessarily useful in their career. I believe that it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. If it is better to master one specific subject, why do the schools teach numerous subjects to the students? A student might agree that the subjects that they are learning in school are useless and meaningless to learn. This is not true because as you grow more mature you will realize that the thing you learned in school really comes to help in real life. So it is better to study and have knowledge of various types of subjects rather than having unlimited knowledge on one subject. It may seem better to specialize in one specific subject when you get a specific job that requires those knowledges you learned. Well, this is just in your carrier. When you get out into the social world, the things you learned are too professional that no one, but you and people who work with them understand. If you want to get involved in social life and understand life better, it is better to know many things. For example, when you go to a party where all kinds of different people gather. You want to talk to people, but you only know that specific topic and do not know other topics that people talk about. As a result, you will be secluded and feel alone. In conclusion, it is better to have broad knowledge of many subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. With broad, but a lot of knowledge you will enjoy a better life where you are not left behind, and you will be able to appreciate other people's opinionsmore.
