title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Almost everyone tries to gain more enjoyable time from life. Being young or old to have more happiness, which is best to have fun? When one is young, he has lots of responsibilities,such as exams or decisions for the rest of his life. These are really great aspects of his life. What about olders? They do not have many responsibilities except their health. In my opinion,young people enjoy life more than older people do. Actually, they have more chance to enjoy themselves in terms of their health and enjoyment opportunities. Although having big responsibilities, young people can have more energy for fun. Due to the fact that their physical conditions are more suitable, they could be able to do almost anything they prefer. For example, if you want to do bungee jumping you have to have a strong heart and generally youngsters have. Another point is that funny things are generally produced for young people. Because generally the number of young people more than older business owners focuses on the young people'spreferences. Television programs, discos and these kinds of places always attract young people. Olders usually distrub from noise and crowds. When all these points are taken into consideration, I can repeat that youngsters enjoy life more than older people do. Of course people start to wait for their deaths after a specific age but we all obviously say that young people have more advantages overolder people.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The tendency of the statement "Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well" is right. I think so because I am a person who acts risky and I have always had success. But before you generalize you have to know what risk means in this context. Risk according to your career is to be brave to live and work or study in a foreign country for longer than 3 months. Risk in terms of success in my opinion is to apply for another job even though you are happy and safe right now with your situation. My risk started after I finished my internship at Neuss County Council as an IT-Specialist. Working for a government facility is quite secure. The chance that you will lose your job is low. But I have thought that this cannot be everything in my life. I wanted to apply for a job in a call center because I thought that talking to people might help my problem of communication. I applied for the best call center in my region and I worked for Microsoft. Even now I am writing my thesis to graduate at Microsoft Germany. I also worked and studied one semester in the United States. The time scale here is approximately 10 months. My exchange semester in South Korea and my internship at the Korean German Chamber of Commerce and Industry were also great experiences. If I review my journey right now and compare it to some friends who never left the city where we graduated high school I can definitely say that I have an advanced status. The reason for this conclusion is because this friend of mine applied for the same internship program. So the arguments are not only my thoughts but my experience. Additionally, my friend had to admit that I always have something to talk about. And we figured out that the more information you get the more opportunities you can turn into successful projects. Right now I am preparing to build up my own business because I have contacts worldwide. And not every person in the world likes to do business unpersonally with people through the internet.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: In the modern world that we know, a lot of different products are available. Are we always aware carefully about all those products? Should it be the responsibility of companies to make sure customers know everything about risks that could be created by using their products? In fact, the law wants all risk concerning a product to be identified by the producer. Some believe that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. Personally, I don't agree with this. Those advertisements make you think twice, and at least, they make sure the customer is aware of risks. First, Those advertisements make you think twice before buying a product like alcohol are tabaco.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: People have different opinions on whether having general knowledge of many academic subjects is better than specializing in one specific subject. people who disagree with the statement argue that specific knowledge is useful to get better jobs. However, I agree with the topic for two reasons : capability and social relationships. I will explain these reasons in detail. To begin with, broad knowledge is a capability which has one of the factors in modern society. Nowadays society wants people who have diverse abilities. Also, many universities offer various curriculums to students. For example, my sister has many abilities, such as English ability and resources of economy, policy and art. So when she meets people, almost all people like my sister. One day, she went to the bank to exchange his dollars. Hence, she saw some foreigner. So she asked for something to happen and the man answered that he did not find their company, Therefore, she talked to him and resolved the problem, After that, she got some requests to get a job. This means that ability is useful for living in society. Second, it is good for sustaining social relationships. People want to make relationships with brilliant people. Moreover, they need to obtain a good qualification to get  a job. Besides, many private institutes to learn creat in our society. Among them, language courses are a good example. At my University, Kookmin University, there are many courses in language such as Chinese, Japanese and English. Consequently, many people concentrate on the course. Therefore, the courses are finished enrolling. Also, my university offers a conversation course for students. It means that it is useful for students. In conclusion, I support that information about many academic subjects is better than information about professional subjects for the following reasons. First, it is an ability which modern people should have. Second, it is eligible for keeping social relationships.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with the stated idea. I think there will be more cars in use in twenty years from now. Cars have been one of the indispensable means of transportation since they were invented. And even though there have been many other transportation systems developed, such as the subway and airplanes, cars have never been out of people's lives. Instead of being replaced by other transportation systems, they have changed to better versions continuously. Moreover, some people are very interested in buying or collecting old versions of popular cars, like the classic model of the  Beatles ". Cars may be considered just as a means of moving. But the purpose of owning a car has changed over time, and nowadays some want cars to show their life style and personalities. For this reason, there will be more cars in the future. However, it's possible that new and better means of transporting will be invented in the future, but I believe that cars will be developed to be a better means than now. As we've been doing this for a long time, we can find better resources for power, and also better designs for cars. Also there will be more cars considering people 's tastes today. Living in a modern world, many people prefer to stay private wherever possible and want to feel at home whenever possible. At that point, cars are the best way to choose. I predict that fancier, more comfortable, faster, and safer means of moving than cars will appear in twenty years.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.

For example, it is claimed about football shoes that they can not be dirt because of their clothes but if the clothes of the shoes are like this why is it not said to me that its color may be changed in time.', "When my first usage of the shoes' color suddenly changed and I was shocked but I did not say anything because advertisements do not include anything about its color."]

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: One of the famous social institutions amnesty international has more members than ever before and the interesting thing about their members is that they are more young people than adults which seems to negate the common sense that young people are egoists and prefer to do more for themselves than for other people. The important and connecting fact in this diverse thesis is that there are more young people who are social engaged, usually work for different organisations, but also try to look for their own interests and career. There are a lot of pupils and students who work during their free time for non-profit institutions like places where homeless people can find food, clothes or a place to stay during the cold season. And also there are many students who choose their subjects at university in social areas like medicine or law to help other people. But the important distinct of now and the past is that young people do not go to demonstrations or show their political understanding in society like their parents twenty years ago. The young adults combine their modern life with their own car and expensive clothes with social engagement. But in fact, there are a few students who do not care about other people.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Some people say it's better to specialize in one specific subject. But I think it's better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects for two reasons. Therefore, I agree with this statement. There are advantages to specializing in one thing. And also it's needed in some occupations. An example which makes this clear is that a pilot needs special knowledge about an airplane and how to fly it. But I find more advantages to studying many academic subjects. First, I think if their knowledge is broad, They can have a wider view. For instance, as the internet has been invented and a better transportation system has developed, you go abroad more frequently. Also you become to see many people who have different backgrounds. At that time, you have to recognize and understand other cultures or history. If you don't have a wide view, you can't understand and it may be a conflict. Second, today , it's a really complicated connected society so it's really important to study several academic subjects. For example, if you are a doctor, you must know how new machines work too.

First, I think if their knowledge is broad, They can have a wider view. title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I am in accordance with the statement that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. The reason why I am in agreement with this is that I suppose that successful people are dedicated to making better in any way they operate, and they want everytime a new target, much more difficult from the past, to obtain. For this reason they try new things and sometimes they take risks but this gives them the sensation of the power and the potential they have. The normal people see them and consider that in the same situation or position they didn't take risks fairly like successful people do. Infact normal people many times, consider successful people too much out of the world for the reason that I mentioned at last. Contrary to what ordinary people think I consider that successful people go in another way from normal people because, if it is not true, they can be successful people. The success of a person is given first of all by nature because a successful person, before he had success, he was born with a particular ability in speaking, playing in general and making better wath he had to do, respect other people. With the growth of the person, success comes to the people that had this particular ability since they were young and for this reason they became "effective" successful people. Society in general considers that taking risks is the best way to safeguard or die. I support a different position, and this is that if a man doesn't take many risks in his life continues to be the ordinary man that he is. But if a man takes many risks (not everytime, but sometimes) it is a sign of that he could be a successful person. The successful people have to their part the luck, infact sometimes they do an activity with much more success than normal people could obtain.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Indeed, many successful people in history were willing to try new things and take risks, but do all successful people try new things and take risks? I don't think so. I think successful people are the ones who are top in their field. If he or she can do one thing best, he or she will be a successful person. From this point of view, successful people do not always have to try new things and take risks. We see some who do something new and succeed, so that we say successful people "always" try new things and take risks.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Many young people enjoy their life, but not every one enjoys it. Many people fail their life and do not enjoy their life. The happiness of life depends on what people do in their life to be happy and whether the people are satisfied with the result. The statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do can not be true in all situations. Most people have bad things happen in their life. It could happen at any stage of life. Some people have more than one bad memory which causes them to suffer a lot of distress and depression. Many teenagers have a great number of stresses caused by academic, and social problems. Many teenagers get too many stresses and sometimes, those stresses lead to suicide. On the other hand, old people, who retired or are almost retired have nothing to worry about, but their health. Worry is one of the biggest causes of diseases. the body does not function well when people worry too much. Old people don't have a lot to worry about.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: The phrase quoted "YOUNG PEOPLE NOWADAYS DO NOT GIVE ENOUGH TIME TO HELPING THEIR COMMUNITIES" is a factor that lots of adults think may be true. But, I totally disagree with this. The youth of today are very enthusiastic about their given responsibility, their job & their concerns regarding the work that they need to put forth. In this fast paced life of today, with severe competition that comes along from every corner of their life, this makes it impossible for young people to dedicate much time toward their community or to take any social cause they want to do.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.

This statement clearly states that even older people agree with this statement. The time when young people leave their childhood , they get a lot of energies in them which they would definitely try to utilize, unlike in the older age when they cant even have enough energy to walk around. At a young age , people can do whatever they want ,like for example go to the gym , play sports with much ease. If these are also the interests of older people then they could have done it at their young age only. Since the young person has something called the young blood flowing in his body he/she will be affected by fewer diseases because at that age the immunity is at its greatest level Also, any injuries they suffer have the capability to recover quickly. Some young people actually take advantage of their age and endure themselves in disorderly pleasures like boozing , combating with others if necessary or even enjoying having sex which the older ones may not enjoy.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree partly. The whole situation changes from time to time and through globalization there have been a lot of important changes in society. Young people definitely have more possibilities to spend their free time on things they really like and therefore one could easily say that there is a big change in the behaviour of young people. Furthermore life becomes faster and that is why everybody, not only young people, has to think better about how and why they do the things they do and if it is the best they can do. Besides that it differs from age, religion and place in society how active or passive young people are in their communities. My own experiences are that I myself help a lot in my community and lots of my friends do so too. An other point one has to have in mind is how young people feel in the community. If they are happy with the world around them the help of young people is logical, but if they have no friends and fun at work it is logical that they are not willing to help the community and prefer to sit in their room next to the computer or television. Besides that the government could try to make help and work of young people more public, so that young people can see, that they can help and perhaps can have a better feeling throughout that, what they have done. For me it would be important to show which goals young people can achieve. Finally it seems as if young people are lazy and do not give enough time to help their community, but in my opinion nothing has changed and nothing will change.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The numbers of cars increase everyday. People who do not have cars buy cars. This will be a controversial situation in the future, the number of cars in twenty years will increase or not. Too many cars will cause traffic problems, people will not go to their jobs on time. In my opinion, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today because of the improvements in new transportation systems. In future, the underground transportation system is going to improve, as the construction technology is improving. It is going to be easier to build new tunnels for the subway in every part of the city. The number of subway stations will increase in future. As a result, people can travel easily around the city. For example, in one station there will be five or more lines, which will have different directions. In cities, people prefer to use subways without having park problems, traffic jams, taxes. Also, the resources of petreloum are decreasing everyday, so prices are increasing and cars have become expensive transportation vehicles. The second reason for not using cars is going to be the scooters. As the improvements made in the electricity engines are applied to the scooters. For example, the shuttle scooter was started to sell in the market and people were interested in it. In twenty years people will be using scooters instead of cars. The third type of transportation vehicle is the plane which causes the fall of cars in twenty years.

The second reason for not using cars is going to be the scooters. As the improvements made in the electricity engines are applied to the scooters. For example, the shuttle scooter was started to sell in the market and people were interested in it. In twenty years people will be using scooters instead of cars.', 'The third type of transportation vehicle is the plane which causes the fall of cars in twenty years.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The numbers of cars increase everyday. People who do not have cars buy cars. This will be a controversial situation in the future, the number of cars in twenty years will increase or not. Too many cars will cause traffic problems, people will not go to their jobs on time. In my opinion, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today because of the improvements in new transportation systems. In future, the underground transportation system is going to improve, as the construction technology is improving. It is going to be easier to build new tunnels for the subway in every part of the city. The number of subway stations will increase in future. As a result, people can travel easily around the city. For example, in one station there will be five or more lines, which will have different directions. In cities, people prefer to use subways without having park problems, traffic jams, taxes. Also, the resources of petreloum are decreasing everyday, so prices are increasing and cars have become expensive transportation vehicles. The second reason for not using cars is going to be the scooters. As the improvements made in the electricity engines are applied to the scooters. For example, the shuttle scooter was started to sell in the market and people were interested in it. In twenty years people will be using scooters instead of cars. The third type of transportation vehicle is the plane which causes the fall of cars in twenty years. As technology is improving, in the future airplanes will be cheap, easy to fly and small. So, people can buy airplanes. For example, airplanes will take off from the roofs of houses and land on where the people go.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: During their all long period of education and graduation, students are learning many things on different topics and are developing many skills. That gives them the opportunity to improve some of them. Is that more important for a student to understand what he is learning, or just to keep things in mind without any explanations or added value ? On the one hand, I think that it is essential for a student to understand what is being taught to him for the simple evidence that he will better keep it in mind. If we take the example of an economic classroom, it will be more efficient for the student to understand the concept of " liberalism" for instance by understanding the way it works and its features, than just knowing the fact that this is an economic way in opposition to others as " socialism". But on the other hand, it is sometimes difficult for a student to understand every aspect of an idea or a concept. This made the fact that some students are tough in one area and weak in an other one. In this case it would be a better way for the student just to learn his class without any more understanding, just like a robot.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I do not agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. There are many disadvantages to following the tour guide. Even getting a tour guide can be harmful and dangerous for tourists. First of all,when you follow the tour guide to see around the city which you want to see and travel,you can only see places in which the tour guide shows you and your group. You can not find out around the city. Everytime there are some limitations which are made by the tour guide. For example,you want to see the other side of the city,but there is a certain travel program which includes seeing certain places in the city. You have to follow the travel program. Secondly,People who are from that city can understand that you are a tourist. This system has some difficulties. They can cheat on you or sell kind of present things to you much more expensively. For example,when you go to a store for shopping,if they understand that you are a foreigner or a tourist they can try to sell many things much more expensive,but if you travel alone and you can speak the language of that country which you want to see they can not understand that you are a foreigner or a tourist. So people who are from that country or that city can sell things to you for the original price. Third of all, traveling with groups is not an expensive activity but it is also very dangerous. There are many terrorist people or groups who want to kidnap tourists and foreign people to come true their bad purposes. Those kinds of people can realize that you are a tourist,because you are travelling with the group and following the tour guide. They can kidnap you and kill you. Furthermore they can use you for their purposes. That situation happened with tourists many times. Those people killed the tourists or got money from the tourists of the family.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I do not agree that life is more enjoyable for young people than for elderly people. It is not a fact which is proved scientifically that young people enjoy life more than older people do. As for me, when you get older you will learn what kind of facilities and activities make you happy or unhappy. Because of experiencing more than younger  people, being older has lots of advantages. Firstly, young people are more interested in trying new things. But it is not sure that they will enjoy what they do. They will experience an action to learn something. Sometimes this can lead young people to be unhappier than before. On the other hand, when you become older, I am sure that you will be more clear about new things. Moreover, when somebody gets older, he or she generally becomes what sort of actions change the mood positively. As a result of these experiences, old people get a better time though they have fewer times to live than young people have. Secondly, the ages lived teach people to be more patient. That is why older people tend to insist on doing something even though they were very unsuccessful at it before.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: With this set of materials I'm really disagree! Cars will be fewer is a fantastic future! In fact in recent years the number of cars on the road has multiplied! Only if an organization like a GOVERNMENT or a much more important like ONU or NATO will make some measures like laws for this problem will we see fewer cars turn around! Mysys is supported from the known of human mind! Some years ago people every day walked , went by bike or took a bus to go to work, to study or to do other things! Today man is able to buy a car and use it for his things, this because the world has changed and is changing! Many years ago people got up in the morning and thought about what the best ways to find food were? Later in the years when man got up, he thought: How can i do to live better? This is one of the means of evolution! So, I'm sure, next year people will think, for example, how many cars can i buy to live better? Another example to support my opinion you can find in recent years. Family ten years ago had only one car for the family, and that father usually used. Today for each family you can find a maximum oftwo cars, one for a wife and one for a husband. Now the number of cars is increasing and next year you will see better in one family every component of a family has a car! I know some of my friends that have two cars for each one.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I think this is an interesting statement. I can give a direct testimonial of a successful person that I know very well and of whom I know how he works: this person is my father. Mr. Dario (I love calling him by name) is at the moment the General Director of CARIPE bank, a bank that is included in the BPI group. I think that to arrive at this level one person always has to take risks not only "rather than only doing what he already knows how to do well". And I tell this not only at work level, but at personal level too. I'll explain this: we live in Ravenna, a city in northern Italy. Now I'm in Barcelona for my erasmus experience but normally I study in Milan which is far from Ravenna. To do this work, my father had tried a new type of life. Every week, for 5 days a week, he goes away from home and lives on his own in Pescara, the city where the center of the bank is located. The decision that has caught my father, I think, is the most difficult choice that a man with a brilliant career from one part and a good and lovely family from the other can take. The distance from Pescara and Ravenna is 450 km but my father spends the maximum time that he can find at home. For maximum time I mean the week end but a total week end. To return to Pescara he starts on Monday morning at five a. m.

The decision that has caught my father, I think, is the most difficult choice that a man with a brilliant career from one part and a good and lovely family from the other can take. The distance from Pescara and Ravenna is 450 km but my father spends the maximum time that he can find at home. For maximum time I mean the week end but a total week end. To return to Pescara he starts on Monday morning at five a.', 'm.']

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I totally agree with this statement. Firstly, travelling in groups led by a tour guide is convenient. leading by a tour guide, you may not have to worry about the issues during the trip. For example, you don't need to think about which hotel you should choose to stay in, where you have a meal, and which cars or trains you should take. Every thing is arranged well by the tour guide. The only thing you need to do is to follow the group, see beautiful sights and enjoy them fully. Also, you can get a lot of knowledge and insight from the presentation of a tour guide. Tour guides are given good training or education in how to introduce the information about sight to tourists. In this sense, they are professional people who are most familiar with the information of sight. Having an introduction from the tour guide, I believe all of you will get comprehensive knowledge without any efforts. However, when you take a lonely trip, no one provides this kind of service and you may miss the best chance to learn about the world. Moreover, there are often many people in a travel group. I am a sociable person and I like to do many things with other people. I hate loneliness.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I think being specialised in one specific subject is good, but is not enough for your personal development. First of all, I think it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects because it is better to improve your communication with people. I mean, if your knowledge is really broad,you will certainly be able to talk about a lot of different subjects with a lot of different people. Being open minded in your knowledge leads you, most of the time, to being open minded socially. It is important to be interested in several things, that shows your ability to adapt yourself to different situations, and i do believe that being able to adapt yourself to a given situation is always a good point; whatever you actually want to do in life. Furthermore, the more you learn, the more you want to learn (and need to learn actually). The desire to learn can be found if you are specializing in one specific subject, but a single subject may lead you to isolate yourself in technical considerations that no one can actually understand, whereas plurality of subjects makes your mind breathe. It is no longer a question of 'academic" knowledge, it is a question of curiosity. According to me, acknowledgement goes the same way as it goes for food, that is to say if you eat the same food everyday, you will just be quickly disgusted. Therefore, if you just study one single subject, even if you go deeply through it, you will be disgusted one day somewhat. To summarize, I think it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects because you can thus talk about more things, and it makes you so curious as if you were majoring in one specific subject.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The statement expressed is one thing people and particularly all researchers of mobility would like to know. From the first car that appeared in our lives, their quantity has not stopped increasing. So, which will be the future for the car? Nowadays car is an important part of our life. We use it for everything because everything is easier with it. On average a normal citizen could move around 20 kms per day in his car to go to work, shopping or whatever. That's seems to be going to be the most predictable future thanks to being the most comfortable way of living. However there is something that grows at the same pattern as cars: traffic. A lot of researchers say that traffic is the disease of the actual cities. When it appears it is nearly impossible to control it. This is something that goes against cars because when people last double time to do the same route, one question starts to appear: Do I have other means of transport? In fact our society has a variety of transport we had never imagined, but they are not so easy-going as cars are. Although it is proved that they are faster and cheaper than our cars, people do not like them. Statements like the bus is crowded, I have to walk a lot to the train station. are very common and set public transport behind cars, except when they do not depend on traffic jams and allow people to sleep some minutes more before going to work. The environment is another thing we have to take care of. The Kyoto protocol is clear in that aspect: most production of greenhouse effect gasses is caused by private transport. So it is not so difficult as in 20 years time cars will be banned from downtown, like in London Happens at themoment. As a conclusion predictions about cars are difficult to state. Everything depends on human behaviour, environmental consciense and political response. Who could imagine a world without cars? Me!.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the statement. In Korea, all high school students work only on studying. Also their parents force them tostudy. As a result, all the students lose time helping their communities. They do not even help their family. Most Korean live in apartments. Once upon a time, everyone knew all the members of their town, and there was not anyone who did not know anyone in their town, because they always cared about their neighborhoods. However the apartment does not give them any chance to meet their neighbours. One more, the jobs are getting more professional. Everyone engages in different parts of jobs. So they do not have a chance to think about their neighbourhoods and communities. So the reasons i think are studying, apartment and professionalizing of jobs. First of all, studying culture makes students not help their communities. In highschool, all the students compete with eachother so badly, they do not have anytime to think abouttheir communities. They will have to go to academies after school, and they will be so tired. After the academies, they will fall asleep right after arriving at home. This culture makes this society like that. Second, living in apartments is one of the reasons. Apartment is a separate place. All the people do not care about their neighbors and do not know who their neighbours are. The apartments are getting so big, and they will not remember who the neighbors  are.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Today each person can have his own car without many problems. Having a car is becoming easier in many ways. So the increase in cars can be considered like an obvious result of modern society. But if we think about the future further there may be a completely different situation waiting for us. There are some elements able to limit the car's increase in future. First of all, the development of telecommunication will definitely decrease the need to move. All texts, data,graphics or even sound elements can be transported by the internet so we won't need to move out to get our office to work. Payment is also getting informatised because we are using credit cards and telebanking systems. All the concepts of our life are becoming non-material and they exist just on the internet's web. Decreasing of transport of materials will reduce the number of cars as a means of transport. These days there aren't many private airplanes but in the future airplanes or another system will replace cars. Technology is very fast changing and progressing. Cars will be one of the materials of the last days we won't use anymore. Soon there will be another system which can fill the lack that a car couldn't complete or who can solve problems that a car was provoking like pollution or accidents. The main reason that I suppose the number of cars has decreased is there are a lot of problems caused by cars.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I do not agree with the statement that young people do not spend time helping their communities at this time. This is not true at all because You can see a lot of young people share their free time in projects to help other people as volunteers for the red cross for example or collect money or food to send to non - developedcountries. People nowadays have more information than before about what is going on around them, in the world. This information is seen on the television, read in the newspaper or on the internet, talking with his friends or colleagues. Another thing is the new technologies that make it possible to communicate with more people and share information faster than you could imagine before about what's happening in a place and the possibility to go to those places are easier. All these things make young people aware of reality and they become aware of problems in their communities and in the rest of the world and try to help in the way they can. I am really surprised when I see young people share their time going to the homes of lonely old people one or two times a week, or when they help in their community to collect food , clothes or money to send to non-developed countries or when some tragedy occurs. I am really proud of these young people because they are the future of the next generation and they made a better world.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are one of the modern modes of transportation nowadays, which are commonly used by everyone. Cars can make our lives easier by saving us time and energy. As cars are getting more and more commonly used, the energy needed for cars is getting lesser and lesser. As a result, the energy crisis occurs, and which becomes one of the most important daily issues to us. I believe in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today, because of the scarcity of energy, and the innovation of technology. It is obvious that there are more and more cars on the streets nowadays.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are one of the modern modes of transportation nowadays, which are commonly used by everyone. Cars can make our lives easier by saving us time and energy. As cars are getting more and more commonly used, the energy needed for cars is getting lesser and lesser. As a result, the energy crisis occurs, and which becomes one of the most important daily issues to us. I believe in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today, because of the scarcity of energy, and the innovation of technology. It is obvious that there are more and more cars on the streets nowadays. But has anyone aware of the huge loss of energy? Probably not. Cars will not work without gasoline. As more and more gasoline is purchased, it becomes scarcer. In the economic view, when a good or service is getting scarced, the price of the individual good or service will increase. That is what's happening with gasoline nowadays. As the price of gasoline rises, the living expenses also increase. In the end, people will not use cars as much as we do now. And this is because of the scarcity of energy needed for cars. When the situation of scarcity of energy is happening, people tend to find many ways to solve this problem. The innovation of transportation might be the solution to this problem. Scientists who work on energy development might create new energy instead of the traditional energy, gasoline. With the help of these scientists, the solution will either be having new forms of energy, or new forms of cars that consume less gasoline. Therefore, traditional cars will no longer be used in twenty years. In conclusion, the scarcity of energy and the innovation of technology can reduce the number of cars in the next twenty years. Scarcity of energy leads to the rise in living expenses, which will finally force people not to use cars as much as they do now. The innovation of technology will help develop new forms of energy that will not be used by cars, and new tools of transportation other than cars.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are some people who think travelling led by a tour guide is better, but others prefer to travel alone instead of being guided by a tour guide. But I would have to say, if I was faced with this issue, I would probably follow the tour guide's leading in a group. In the following discussion, I would like to reason and provide examples to support my viewpoint. No issue is more important now than the one that refers to safety. History witnesses and presents many examples of when travelling by oneself may cause some dangers or trouble. For example, we go to a less developed country,such as China, and take money in hand, this behavior may cause some dangers. Or when we travel to an European country with unpolished dressing. Don't you think the examples quoted above are very persuasive? Convenience is another head and chief reason that I have chosen to put it here. It is no better illustration that can demonstrate the view. If the trip is not convenient, it will take the travellers too much energy to enjoy their trips. Even family as a couple. they will be uncomfortable on a busy trip. Superior as leading by a tour guide, leading by tour guide or deciding on a trip by yourself also has its own demerits, too. Deciding on a trip course may take a lot of time and may lose something interesting. Leading a tour guide may lose one's freedom to find something else besides the tour. Nevertheless, the advantages of leading by a tour guide carry more weight than the disadvantages of leading by a tour guide. So the most striking conclusion is obvious. To sum up, given the reasons discussed above, which sometimes intertwine to form an organic whole and thus become more persuasive, we can safely reach the conclusion that leading by a tour guide on a trip is more safe and convenient. In fact, not only do I prefer to travel leading by a tour guide in a group, but also prefer to hire a personal tour guide for one's own tour guide to serve himself as well as possible.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I totally agree with this statement. I agree with this, firstly because I am a forensic scientist, and so during my formation, we had to learn things about all academic branches. For example physics, biology, chemistry, law, etc. But more seriously, it ` s really important to have good instruction, it permits you to express yourself in a lot of conversation and so to speak with a lot of people from various specialities. It is not only useful for public relations, you can use it when you watch TV or read the newspaper, too. Sometimes it`s already really difficult for me to understand what they are talking about on the news on TV. One other thing is that today, with all the media we have, it has become really easy to learn about a lot of academic fields, not really deeply, it`s sure, but sufficiently to understand how the world is going. I can understand people who won`t open their minds to other fields. I am of this kind when you are talking about business or politics. In fact we can`t be interested in everything, but we can interest ourselves in so many things that it would be a shame not to profite fromthis opportunity. Just to put a tragic accent on this essay, we can say that the lack of knowledge is what leads to all the extreme nations our world has known as fascism or really hard communism as in the ancient SovietUnion. In fact, if Hitler had learned to know the Jews and if the inhabitants of the ancient Soviet Union had known what was going on outside the Union, these ``terror`` nations wouldn`t have lived so long! To conclude, the lack of knowledge is nowadays unjustified and it`ll be something bad to not profite from the opportunities we have.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: People have several things for getting knowledge. There are many training subjects that people have broad knowledge of in one specific subject or in many academic subjects. I don't agree with either of them. I think people should have knowledge of one specific subject and also many academic subjects. Because there are many problems in the world and much of them can't be solved by knowing one subject. It requires a lot of knowledge about different subjects. For example, in engineering problems you have to know mathematics, physics and also chemistry to solve them. I think a person also must be good at one subject and he knows everything about this subject.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: There are many aspects that are done on the students to make them learn and two essential ways that students follow and do while they are learning. One way is understanding concepts while the other is learning facts. I agree that it is more important for students to get ideas and concepts than learning only the facts without understanding for many reasons like the belief of the subject and acquiring the ability to apply the concepts withunderstanding. If students learn information without understanding how it came, there is the possibility that one day the information will be changed according to the weak understanding of its concepts. For example, I know an old man who thinks that the earth is a sphere and he kept this information to himself for many years. After decades the man changes his mind since he saw proves that the earth is a sphere even though he believed in the past that it was not a sphere!.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I claim learning facts is more important than understanding ideas and concepts. I will explain my idea by using the example of the controversy about article 9 of the Japanese constitution. Just knowing the ideas and concepts does not directly mean we have the understanding of the topic and having the opinion to act on it. Thinking about the controversy over article 9, the argument about whether revising it or not. Surely, understanding its history which has kept our country peaceful for 60 years, and its idea and concept of renouncing war after the tragic memory of Hiroshima and Nagasaki is very important. But by just "understanding" the ideas of inequality of it, we cannot protect ourselves from the threat of terrorism. So what are we needed to live for? We are strongly needed to be "learning" the facts of the Japan facing now, and the ways we can take to maintain the peace. What happens when North Korean missiles are launched into Japan? Do we not fight for it? Or we fight with self defence forces which is well known to be not suitable for the article 9 itself.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The issue is a complex and though provoking issue that merits a closer look. Some people believe that in the future there will be fewer cars in use than there are today, whereas others oppose this opinion and support that there will be more cars than today. The latter position is certainly the stronger of the two and would be expected in detail. First and foremost, the poor countries will develop themselves. For instance, they will create roads, will sophicate themselves. Because the population will earn more money and the development of these countries, the population will use cars. For example I went to marocco and it is really amazing to see how the development of the country has influenced the number of cars in the country. Besides being important for the development of the poor countries, it is also important for the pollution. We all know that cars are not good for the environment because they pollute it. But, a new oil was discovered and will be less powerful than the older. Two days ago, the french government announced that we will use it soon and that it will be less expensive than the older one. So it will be very good because you will not be a real danger to nature and you will spend less money by driving. The position I support is the best because the car will stay useful and the public transport will not be like the cars. For example if you want to give a present to someone, you just have to put it in the case of your car whereas, if you use public transport, you would have to bring it everywhere during all the day and to walk with it, it is not very useful.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. In my opinion, I think all companies do. I think a lot of people could agree with this statement if they have their own experience of it. Actually, the main goal of advertisements is to make huge profits by selling the products. To do this, they should make a good image of the product, and the product should appear to a lot of people. If it looks not good in the advertisement, people will not buy it. So, this skill is very important to sell the product to the consumers. Sometimes, people buy something without any information. I think this is because the advertisement already built their nice image on people's minds. I have my own experience to support this. When I was in my country Korea, I saw an advertisement for a mini radio from a famous company. It looked really cool and useful to me, so I wanted to buy that mini radio. It was brand new and it was much smaller than mine. I always wanted to have a small radio that I could take everywhere. I ordered that mini radio after I watched the advertisement on television, and when I received it I was surprised. She was not that small. It was just ' a little' smaller than a regular radio However, in the advertisement that I saw, it looked so small such as my little MP3 player. I was very disappointed and I gave that to my older brother. After that mistake, I never ordered the product just by advertisement. Actually, it was not a'mini' radio.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Now a days the most important thing in the life of a person is the mode of transport, by which he goes to work, travels. man has been doing a lot to make his life more comfortable. this need has made him invent many things in which the car is one. this invention led to a faster ,more convenient way of transport. But,as time changed his life also changed. man became more and more busy he does not have time to go out shopping, so he does not go shopping on theinternet. In the same sequence man will develop a more effective mode of transport than thecar. this will lead to the disappearance of cars. like many endangered ones this will also become one. In the next twenty years there will be more fever cars in use than there are today. There are many points in support of this. As he may have to travel less,he may do all his work through the internet sitting in his abode. The price of petrol is reaching it's summit. so,in the saving process he may not use cars any further. When we take the cars into consideration which run on alternative sources for example,natural gas even though the fuel is cheaper than petrol we will run out of petrol soon due to excessive exploitation of the natural resources. The most intelligent animal on this earth being the human. He will consider all these factors into consideration and very soon invent a new mode of transport.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: About the statement, some people may agree that, but others may have negative attitudes. As far as I am concerned, I agree that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. Afterward, I will develop my opinions in sufficient depth and detail. First of all, the transportation is so convenient and developing today. People, including young  people, go everywhere so easily, Their appearances are not limited to the communities. When young people step out of the door of houses, they can take buses, taxis, or subways, even drive cars by themselves and go to the place they want to. They never even pay attention to the communities they live in. How to talk about helping their communities. Moreover, social security today becomes worse and worse. No one can warrant that it's always safe in the communities. It's possible that the bad bad guys are in our neighborhoods.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Taking risks and getting to know the unknown is an important part of being able to move forward and experiencing new things, which is why I strongly agree with the statement. Where would the human race be if our ancestors hadn't taken risks? The desire to do something new and unexperienced or unknown allows development. If Columbus hadn't taken a risk no one would have known about Amerika. Many of our scientific achievements are the results of taking risks. If no one had tried to fly (at the beginning with some strange looking machines) and with that would have taken the risk of breaking an arm or a leg we would still travel by ship (if we are willing to take the risk of sinking). Persons who took a risk are those who are standing in our books and those who achieved something in life and for the human race. But lets just look at a more personal level. If we are willing to take risks we are also open to new experiences. If a person is willing to get to know different cultures and views and is leaving her/his comfort zone, that person will learn something beneficial to her/his life. I would say that taking risks is one of my basic human needs.

Where would the human race be if our ancestors hadn't taken risks? The desire to do something new and unexperienced or unknown allows development. If Columbus hadn't taken a risk no one would have known about Amerika. Many of our scientific achievements are the results of taking risks. title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree with this statement. As a young person myself, I really do not have the feeling to enjoy my life as much as I could. Without having any health issues, nor special disabilities that old people might have on a daily basis, I am just so concerned about my future that it does not permit me to appreciate the enjoyment of life. As young people, your entire life is devoted to the preparation of the future and to how to cope with the responsibilities that accompany life as an adult: young people have to obtain a high diploma to get a good job to pay the apartment to have a family and to afford it. This is why a young person might go through his youth without enjoyment. As an example, most students do, during their studies, a job or an internship, to have money for some higher studies or to complete them with professional experience that might be taken into account by their future employer. In such circumstances, how can they enjoy their lives as students? They have no time to go to students' parties, or they are too tired. Besides, most of them are conscious that these years were supposed to be the best, as their parents told them. Young people do not enjoy life like older people do, and they probably enjoy it less than older people do.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: From many experiences that i have had when i travel, I have learnt that there are kinds of traveling. Some times you go with your family and want to have a nice time. And some times you just travel with some friends or your own. I really enjoy traveling with my sisters and other members of my family. But these kinds of trips are the ones that you wake up early, and go tothe museum or to any historical place. This kind of trip is when you would like to have a tour guide with you. The ones where you enjoy time with your family in a healthy way, and also learn alot from them. There are also the trips that you plan with your friends. You do not want a tour guide with you on these trips, These are adventures ones. The ones that you do not even have a place to sleep until you get there, the ones that you go and just party, the ones that you do not learn anything from them, and just remember what you did there. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The technological development today has also proved itself in the fields of automobiles. So it can't be said that there will be fewer cars in use in twenty years than today. Though there are problems which are faced today due to pollution and resources decline , our technology has solutions to each and every problem. There are many technological innovations in the field of automobiles,and year by year many new designs and varieties of cars are being invented for more comforts. The cars which are designed today use less fuel and they are pollution free,which will be going to improve further in the next twenty years. The cars which run on biogas are presented on the market ,they are creating no pollution,the fuel used is cheap and is available easily in the atmosphere too. Though they are in less use today because of their high cost they may be used in the future in large demand according to the manufacturers' assumptions because the costs of production of these cars may decrease in future. Moreover in the coming years the world will be more developed and will be very busy too. Fast travelling media is necessary for every one who works away from home or goes to colleges etc. Even the ordinary man can afford a car because their costs will be reduced due to high production and can drive the car too. Just like the costs of two wheelers have decreased the costs of cars are also expected to decrease further so that the ordinary man can alsoafford the car. because the large population of the world is of middleclass people. Also the use of more advanced cars which run on biogas ,a pollutionfree fuel will become a must to reduceatmospheric pollution , The use of these cars will be more demanded among the rich people for the sake of their prestige and pride because they are more expensive cars.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There is no doubt that whether young people enjoy more than old people do has become more controversial in today's modern society. As a matter of fact, this issue deals with a lot of different aspects. Specifically, there are no universal answers to this question. Depending on different elements such as social influence, personal interest, educational background etc, the answers of different people may vary greatly. As far as I am concerned, I vote that young people do not enjoy life more than old people. In the following paragraphs, I would like to explain my view from several perspectives. In the first place, the important reason in support of my view is that young people encounter more or at least the same amount of physical problems than older people do.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are some reasons to agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. First, tour guides have knowledge of the travel place. A tour guide can introduce important parts of a place and important objects. For example, Our family went to New york, in 2004. At that time, we didn't have a tour guide. The first time, we feel ok. When we leave that country, we don't have some knowledge of that country. We feel very bad. But tour guides cover this kind of thing. Secondly, tour guides give safety. Other countries have different people, different society and different places. If we have no tour guide, we can get lost or become dangerous from other people. For example, I see an article in a newspaper. That article's story is dangerous for sole travel. In that article there are two students. Two students enjoy their trip. But on the last day, one student goes to some place. That student lost the way. Suddenly, a gangster kidnaps that student. People can't find that student.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the fact that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are, but there are several reasons for this and it is not always the case. With the huge rise in consumption society, more and more products are proposed to the customers. Most of the products are really similar. How does the difference between two bottles of water which have the same price make a difference? This is the role of communication and advertising. Companies will present the products in a better way. They will associate it with a lot of qualities and significations. With advertising, companies create the image of the product, and this image makes the difference when the customers buy the products. So, the customers don't have to mix the real qualities and specificities of a product and his image. For example, a brand of water shown in one of his advertisements is about babies dancing and swimming in waters. That doesn't mean that each person who drinks this water becomes a baby and jumps directly into a swimming pool. A second problem for companies is how to sell a cake or a fragrance by advertising? People can't taste or smell the product. Consequently, advertisements suggest the flavour or the taste of the product, and as everybody has his personal tastes and preferences, everybody doesn't always agree with the advertisement. Finally, advertising doesn't always present the products in a better way than reality. Advertisements are controlled by law and the associations of customers. Companies can't lie about theirproducts, lying advertising is punished by law and in this case the company loses all its credibility and the trust of itscustomers. To conclude, advertising makes a product seem better to make business. It doesn't lie, it improves the reality.

Companies can't lie about theirproducts, lying advertising is punished by law and in this case the company loses all its credibility and the trust of itscustomers. To conclude, advertising makes a product seem better to make business.", "It doesn't lie, it improves the reality."]

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Old people and young people do not have the same activities, hobbies, and tastes. In fact, your life is totally different from an age to an other. While young people study older people have more responsibilities. However when people are young they are not considerate as adults so they can do what ever they wish : have fun with their friends, party a lot, not take care of the house, not have duties. However, they have to work a lot to get a good future. Young people choose in a way what they will be after. If they study well, they can have a better job. This isn't a great joy, you are in competition with all of yourfriends, you might lose some friends for better grades. So in order to have fun after school they have to be determined. Nevertheless, after school when you get a nice job well paid you will still have to work hard all your life. It's not easy, it's stressful. People can be alone, when you are at school you have the opportunity to make a lot of friends because you come from the same area, the same town, you have the same interests whereas when people get older they feellonely, sometimes because they don't like their jobs or it's hard for them to be part of the workforce. Although if you get money you can travel a lot or sometimes enjoy yourself with your family and friends, these moments are very rare. With people getting older they have new responsibilities in life : children, house and job. Finally, old people can have an enjoyable life when they are retired.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. One thing is good about successful people they already know how to do what they know and succeed with it. Now, they need to move on to another level and have more experience. they also want to come up with a new project which can make them more successful. Successful people should come up with more projects, do more research into their knowledge because the more they know, the more they succeed and it will be worthwhile for them too. It is important for people who have large opportunities to what they know to attract the popularity of success. On the other hand, people with creativity are a benefit to the world because they always come up with new projects and they can handle the future easily. therefore, every body in the world can count on them , such as the government ,health care providers , sections of cultural, sections of education and commercial. Which can make their work easier by coming up with new projects. Successful people who try new things and take risks will be more success ful than other people who are afraid to take the risks and try new things ; because they will limit what they can learn and they could help. Unfortunately , they willn't be helpful for people who will need them , and the future will also be limited for them and others. The world will reject them and it will be a waste of time for them.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Young People And The Community I think that I would have to agree with this statement, according to nowadays young people dont help or participate enough in their own communities, and I mainly think that this is because of the world today and its busy busy busy life. Because nowadays a lot of young people can't even afford to lose time on playing or engaging in any kind of fun activities, Because they can barely make it from home to college and from college to their part time work (if they have one) and then going home again to do their chores and finish studying and doing their homework , which takes a lot of them dropping them beat on the bed at the end of the day. But then again this does not apply to every young person, some people choose not to participate in their own communities because they do not think that the community itself is not doing a good job maintaining things at hand, and so they dont want to interfere with the bumpy roads ahead. But also there is quite a fair amount of young people with plenty of free time who would love to help their communities to prosper and to feel good about them selves as individuals in doing so, and not to forget that working pro bono for the community means no money, and not many people who would want to waste their time and not get paid in the end, so sticking to their jobs is the better answer for their time. So in conclusion, I do agree with the statement that young people dont give enough time to help their own communities, but at the same time I disagree that they should help the community and give their time and efforts away on the count of their futures, but this does not apply to those young people who dont think and give much time to their future or their community because they should, after all,.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The teachers teach us a lot of different things. They always teach us that understanding the idea and the concepts of each article is more important than learning the facts. Even though we are students or the teachers. First, understanding the ideas and concepts is to make sure that you know everything about this story or article. If you did not understand what it was talking about, you would never get the facts of it. My English teacher always says that way to me. If we want to learn good English, we should read it more than once to understand the idea. It likes the characters, setting, plot, and the background. When we can get all of the above, we will understand the ideas and the concepts. Trying to read it more than once, it would be easier to get what it says in the reading. I always do that way, because I want to get higher marks for every test or quiz. When we do that, we will learn more when we read. Learning the facts is not really a bad thing to learn.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Most people love cars and want cars. Buying a new fancy car is a dream for billions of people who do not have a car. The quantity of cars will increase continuously in several decades. Because of cheap cars, the developing country and the desire of people increase the number of cars. First, our car technology has advanced rapidly in recent years, and it makes cars cheaper. It is hard to imagine owning a car in the 70's for a non-rich family. My father told me that there were fewer than one hundred cars in oursity when he was young. So he did not think about having the car, but he has one now. Because of the cheap car, cars will increase in twenty years than there are today. Second, there are hundreds of developing countries and undeveloped countries. These countries will develop like other countries someday, The similarity of the developing countries is growing because of the car population. In the 1950's Korea was one of the poor countries in the world because of the Korean war. But, after America's help, Korea became a modern country in 30years. In the 1950's only a few foreigners owned cars. But after 30years every single family had acar. Last, the desire of people will increase the car population. Most men want to buy a car if they have a lot of money.
sents: ["Most people love cars and want cars. Buying a new fancy car is a dream for billions of people who do not have a car. The quantity of cars will increase continuously in several decades. Because of cheap cars, the developing country and the desire of people increase the number of cars. First, our car technology has advanced rapidly in recent years, and it makes cars cheaper. It is hard to imagine owning a car in the 70's for a non-rich family. My father told me that there were fewer than one hundred cars in oursity when he was young. So he did not think about having the car, but he has one now. Because of the cheap car, cars will increase in twenty years than there are today. Second, there are hundreds of developing countries and undeveloped countries. These countries will develop like other countries someday, The similarity of the developing countries is growing because of the car population. In the 1950's Korea was one of the poor countries in the world because of the Korean war. But, after America's help, Korea became a modern country in 30years. In the 1950's only a few foreigners owned cars. But after 30years every single family had acar. Last, the desire of people will increase the car population.", 'Most men want to buy a car if they have a lot of money.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I agree with the statement that it is better to have broad knowledge rather than specialized in one specific area. This is because everything in this world is related to each other and you cannot solve any problems or do something new without having other knowledge. For instance, cooking, chemistry and biology seem all different subjects which don't have a relationship with each other. However, they are strongly connected with each other and you won't be able to do any cooking without having knowledge of chemistry and biology. You might think not all people cooking at home have had a chemistry class and biology class. I take your point; what you have thought is absolutely true. What I want to say is that you don't need to have professional and deep knowledge of them. For example. if you want to cook meat, what do you do first? This is maybe depending on what meat you are going to cook and how tough it is and how big it is. If this meat is too big to cook or eat, you need to cut the brock into smaller pieces.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Every one of us dreams of enjoying his life during all his living period until his last day. But I personally think that young people enjoy life more than old people. First young people have less responsibilities toward the family, so they have much more liberty to do what they want and to go wherever they please. They could enjoy their life by traveling or taking risks in some adventure , doing dangerous things or crazy things, while old people have their families and their responsibilities to take into account. Young people also could go to some entertainment places with their mates such as pubs and discotheques where there is so much noise that old people couldn't bear it. There are also some nice places that are open exclusively for young people , old people are note permitted to enter them.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Being Young There is a common feeling that the best times of our lives are the times that we are young. A human being with his body getting older and older could not be the same person when he was young. It is true that young people enjoy life more than old people,that`s just how our lives are. First of all,the main fact is that an old person could not do the things that a young person can do. Instead of knowing how to enjoy life,there are some limits to what an old man can do. Secondly,as a person gets older,his needs and interests change parallel to his age. Although there are some people who want to live their earlier life,the commonly accepted fact is that an old person does not want to live like he used to live when he was young. Anyway, a person lives his most exciting moments when he is young and being old is starting to share his expressions with younger people. It is a time of life when a person starts to think more than he used to. Young people enjoy life and old people live to earn a living for themselves.

First of all,the main fact is that an old person could not do the things that a young person can do. Instead of knowing how to enjoy life,there are some limits to what an old man can do. Secondly,as a person gets older,his needs and interests change parallel to his age. Although there are some people who want to live their earlier life,the commonly accepted fact is that an old person does not want to live like he used to live when he was young. Anyway, a person lives his most exciting moments when he is young and being old is starting to share his expressions with younger people. It is a time of life when a person starts to think more than he used to.', 'Young people enjoy life and old people live to earn a living for themselves.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. If you want to be successful, you should try new things, take risks and be brave. First of all, success comes from trying new things which you have never done before. You should investigate, think about new things and make your decision step by step. After all of them you should start what you want to do. For example, Bill Gates left university and created Microsoft which would be the number one in the world. He found a useful program which was named Windows. People all over the world use it because it is new and it has no alternative.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I think that the statement will probably not reflect the real vision of the future. In twenty years there will be hopefully more cars than today. Cars represent a material good which everyone in modern society must have in order to keep up with the world outside. Whatever you do, you need a car. Wherever you go, you need a car. It's definitely a must. That's why i believe the number of cars will increase in the future. Also, long distances are now an everyday part of life. Most of today's jobs usually require a car in order to get around, to go anywhere. In fact it is so common now to move from city to city for work, and many people find it easier to move by car, since the bad service of trains or planes often end up being annoying and stressing. In fact, when you have to catch a train , It often happens that the train is delayed. the same happens with planes. So you find yourselves waiting for hours at the train station or at the airport, telling yourself " I should have used my car! ". That's one of the reasons I do believe people would rather use their car than take public transportation. Therefore, if people need to use the car, whoever doesn't own one, will need to buy one, and that will increase the number of cars. Besides, I believe that we should also consider the young people in order to forsee that the numbers of cars will definitely increase in the next few years. In fact we have to take into account how important kids are withinsociety. They represent the customers of the future. They will also be the cars' buyers of the future. Young kids can't wait to turn eighteen years old only to get their driver'slicence. They look forward to having their own car, because they want to feel independent, free, they want to turn into adults finally. One of the feelings to feel like a grown up man or woman is driving your car. your own car represents a piece of the world of yours. Only yours.
