title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people believe that young people enjoy life more than older people , but from the daily life point of view I think that also older people can enjoy life in many ways. In this modern society, cities,towns, and also little countries offer all aged people the right ways to enjoy life. Young people can meet each other in disco clubs, pubs, cafes and spend their time together. The same things can be done also by elderly people, if the health is good. Maybe, in my opinion, young people can enjoy life with more sports than older people. Young people have a young body with many energies to spend.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: HAVING A BROAD KNOWLEDGE OF MANY ACADEMIC SUBJECTS, OR SPECIALIZING IN ONE SPECIFIC SUBJECT? Having broad knowledge of many academic subjects can make the students know a little about every subject but it won't get focused on a specific subject. Specializing in one specific subject can make the students know everything about one subject but won't make them know almost anything about other subjects. People choose jobs and they only have to know all the information about that specific subject that they work on. They aren't responsible for knowing information about any other subject. These ways the distribution of jobs is formed. Although this way of job descriptions is formed, knowing everything about one subject can make people bored. Knowing a little about every subject makes people open minded and more interesting. They can look at the world from different angles and since humans are social beings , a little color into everyone's life is needed. If people only knew about one topic and had no idea about any other topic, everybody would be bored. People would only make friends with people of the same job type because they would have no common subject with people of other job types. If people knew a little about everything and did not focus on one topic, then everybody would have to do all of its work itself and no job distribution would be made.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: The issue of advertising is topical. I mean that currently you are always in relations with some kind of advertisement like in TV or in newspapers or on the internet and it is difficult not to take it in count and after not comparing the quality of the product with what you thought it would be. From my point of view, i agree with that statement for several reasons. First ,one of my reasons is one of my experiences. One day i bought a chimical liquid in order to clean my kitchen and i was really disappointed with the result moreover the price was expensive for the result i had in comparison with what they show on TV. Second ,if i was a businessman, I think my goal would be to get the most profit that i can. Thus ,i will buy poor material and then manufacture it , sell it, and use advertising to show why my product is better than an other one. So i will just emphasize all the qualities. From my opinion, it is a common way to do business, and advertising is business. Third,i am convinced that some advertisements lie about their products just because it exists some associations to defend customers' rights against. if you do not appreciate the service or the product you bought you can go to their type of association and charge in court the company of the product.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Understanding ideas and concepts is more important for students than learning facts. I agree with this statement. There are several reasons for this. One does not have to waste time learning facts and also experience can help students to learn facts. Just understanding the idea and concept can also help to be more creative. It is a waste of time giving students everything about the topic. They need to run their own brains to understand what the whole lecture is about. For example in an art class, the teacher wants students to create a new tool for thekitchen. He gives the idea about what he wants but if he gives the facts they do not have to search for anything to increase their knowledge and ability as well. They can not look from a different perspective. Experience is one of the most important points to learn something. For instance, you studied for your lesson and you got your driving licence. Without having experience of how you expect to drive as well as the others can. Experience is more important than learning facts. You give the idea and concept. Afterwards they experience it in real life by facing them. Being flexible in our creations depends on how free we are. Just having ideas can help you be more creative. In order to think well, sometimes we should learn facts by searching for them. In conclusion, trying to learn facts is a kind of waste of time and without experiencing the concepts we learn do not help us to improve ourselves. For these reasons i disagree with this statement.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree that understanding the idea and concept is more important than learning the facts. It is because I think it is easier for you to do something if you know the concept. Actually the concept and idea is the basis, if you know the concept of that thing, it is not hard for you to learn the facts. Because the facts are also coming from the concept. For example, a student can understand the idea of the calculator, it is not hard for him to do other questions in the textbook. Like the " ideas " are the theory in the Mathematics textbook, and the "facts" are the example that is stated in the textbook, you may say it is easier for you to read the example to know how to do the Maths problem. And it seemed to be the fastest way for you to learn. But I do not agree with this, because I know that learning theories is the best way to answer the questions.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: What are the most important things we have to learn at school or at university? That is the question. Is the most important thing to have a good understanding of the main concepts or ideas? Or is it to learn a lot of information, without having a good comprehension of the main concepts? According to me, the main character for a good student at the end of school is a good comprehension and an ability for reproducing the concepts. In your argumentation, we will present some elements in order to give our own opinion. First, I think it's very important for a student to be able to reproduce the main ways of a reflexion. For example, concerning a mathematical exercise, a student will be judged about his ability to do the problem again with different information. So that's more important, it is'nt the basic information but the way of reflection. It's generally the same for every scientific topic. To my mind, it's better to understand the general ideas until of the general facts. Secondly, I believe for general facts like the history facts, students have all the time to learn them in their free time. For example, I don't think a little boy, if he doesn't know the name of the current President, will be a bad student.
sents: ["What are the most important things we have to learn at school or at university? That is the question. Is the most important thing to have a good understanding of the main concepts or ideas? title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: When you ask me, if I agree or disagree with this statement my answer would be: both. On the one hand are many young people active community-members. They help for example in sports clubs , take care of older people or are in a political party. All these activities support the community. On the other hand many young people don't care about the community. They are a kind of egoistic and the reasons vary. Often you hear from young people that they don"t have enough time to help their community, because they have a lot of work to do. But I think this is not the entire truth. Some people are afraid of taking responsibility for something or can " t act in teams. Moreover they are thinking only of time or money and forget that it can be a great feeling to help others. Mostly these people are great critics but they don't try to improve things by helping. My guess is they are lazy too.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: When I read this statement, I automatically think that it is right, young people enjoy life more than older people do. But if I think about it, it appears to be, in fact, the contrary. It is true that young people have discovered everything. When one is born, one has to learn and to build all of who one wants to be. Therefore, a young person has to try and to search for all that he can, to know who he is. In that sense, he enjoys life more than older people, who already know who they are. It is also true that young people have more opportunities to enjoy life than older people. The education system permits them to meet many different people, until the entrance to professional life : the student has to change his educational place all his student life, with the school, the high school, the college, etc. At the contrary, older people already have a durable placement in their company, and therefore have fewer occasions to meet other people. Finally, we know that young people do sports and have activities that older people can not exercise. That is the first impression that I had when I read the statement. But I am young and that is why my spirit only saw advantages for young people. If I am objective, it is obvious that older people also enjoy life. They have their life already lined up, that is true, but all the examples of adults around me show me that it is not a reason for us to stop their hobbies and to stay at home without doing anything to enjoy their life. My father, for instance, decided to quit my mother because he found his life too calm. He has many friends, and now he profits from everything more than, even if I am younger. With the world of today, and globalization, we can have only one job for our entire life, that is why older people have the opportunity to change their lives, to discover other things and other fields.

It is true that young people have discovered everything. When one is born, one has to learn and to build all of who one wants to be. Therefore, a young person has to try and to search for all that he can, to know who he is. In that sense, he enjoys life more than older people, who already know who they are. title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In many schools and institutions it is believed that the importance of learning is by memorizing facts and concepts other than actually understanding them. We are facing two very different types of learning and teaching, and I personally think that the best way is to integrate and comprehend. In the older days, teachers left instructions for the students to memorize and copy facts, dates, names, numbers, among other things. Then, the student wouldn't have passed even 1 year and he would have forgotten everything the History teacher told him to memorize about the second world war. It wouldn't have been of any use memorizing in the first place. Now, on the other hand, I think that a more modern type of teaching is by making the student identify the problems and understand the answers. For example, in mathematics or physics, instead of the teacher giving the formula to meassure the air, or to find a number, let the student find the formula by himself. In a way, I think this type of teaching helps the student to develop certain abilities and its easier for them to solve problems in the near or distantfuture. I think it is very important to actually use the whole percentage of brain we are capable of using and to think, and figure out our own answers. We are not born with the abilities we have, but we reforce them, make them stronger. In my personal opinion, it is much more important for us (students) to understand and comprehend ideas and concepts than it is for us to learn and memorize them. Besides, memorizing is always boring. Its funner to learn by applying this type of teaching.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: In my opinion, traveling the world with a group led by a tour guide is a waste of time and money. First of all, while they give you time to explore places, it's a very short time, so you miss out on lots of things that are necessary. Secondly, crashing a bus that drives for hours and hours without knowing anybody or anywhere just isn't a fun thing to do. Finally, some tour guides don't even know what they are talking about, and don't talk when they are supposed to, so you have to take risks on picking the right time and date. Let's say that you went to an University of Harvard, and they have lots to see like the science center, and famous people who graduated from that place like Bill Gates. So the tour guides tell you to explore places within half an hour which is a very short period of time in such a large place. So while you are looking at unnecessary things, time goes by, and you miss out on the important things like the golden statue. Also if you don't make it in time for the bus, they all complain about waiting for you eventhough it is just for a minute. Eventhough, you go to places with your family or friends, they have lots of other people on the bus who are traveling with you. You could get bored only by talking to your family members or your friends. But some people don't care, because they also have TV's on the bus to entertain you, but it only entertains me a bit. Then all you hear is chattering going on and on beside you and infront of you. You can't tell them to be quiet, because they will point fingers at you and even curse you. The other thing is that if you want to sleep, and lean back your chair a bit, they complain to you about how uncomfortable it is which is very annoying. The Great Wall of China. It has lots of history and legends to it. Surely, people want to know about it, but the tour guide doesn't even say a word about it, and even if he talks aloud, he doesn't know what he is saying. Well i am not saying that every tour guide acts like that, but if you pick the wrong time and date, you will have to face the consequences. Therefore, i disagree with the statement. First of all, the tour guide doesn't give you the right timing for you to explore the place. Secondly, you barely know anybody on the bus except for people who came with you, and finally the tour guide would stink if you picked the wrong bus.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people keep enjoying, sometimes indulging, their youth. They believe that young people enjoy life more than older people do. So they have to consume their limited youth for enjoyment. I have to say such an idea is inappropriate since enjoying life is not a priority for young people. There are many types of enjoying your life, no matter whether you are young or older. Everyone, at any age, can find his or her way of enjoyment. Young people are physically energetic so that they can climb mountains, play Internet games, play basketball and do disco dances.

Everyone, at any age, can find his or her way of enjoyment.', 'Young people are physically energetic so that they can climb mountains, play Internet games, play basketball and do disco dances.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It`s quite common to hear judgments about young people nowadays. It`s even quite popular to think that they are poor in spirit and too selfish to spend time on someone else'slife. Well, I think It`s the way adults usually use to solve some of their internal problems, completely not tied to what the reality is. The reality is that young people nowadays spend much more time helping their community than before, and I think these habits will increase in the future. Modern life has brought us to stress our time in order to do as much as we can: or better, in order to earn as much as we can. This behaviour entails an important aspect: the rising of a new concept of common culture. What I want to say is that now every young person is sufficiently prepared to understand that it is better to work and to make efforts for the community instead of behaving selfishly. Any good action can only improve the common happiness, but our happiness is just inside this commonwealth. It`s even more and more evident how young people are trying to destroy old stereotypes of thinking about what is different. Although until a few years ago hostile behaviour among human races was deeply radiated in common thinking, new social dynamics are strongly addressing young people to accept every kind of difference. Thus making it easier and faster the growing of a new common sense of belonging to a community; and it ` s this new sense of belonging to make us spend more time with this new family. Anyway the increase in the number of young people involved in volunteer groups , such as medical teams in poor areas of the world or even very young people helping elderly people , is a confirmation of what I ` vestated. In conclusion, I can even well understand why many adults think that most young people are poor in spirit : are not they to teach us in university classes that the only god we must pray to is money? And the only way to earn money isn`t time?.

And the only way to earn money isn`t time?.']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Some students prefer to gain ideas and concepts, but I prefer learning facts. Facts are mandatory to learn history and culture, practical exposure improves man's ability, and soul satisfaction. First of all, facts provide ancient history and culture. If one experiences an incident one never forgets that incident. There is a proverb that says " history never repeats'. we can get more knowledge from the past and our experiences. History of our forerunners helps us to live life made easy. Now scientists are discovering new things based on the past history of theories. Secondly, practical knowledge is better than abstract knowledge. Our personnel experiences help us to guide us in how to deal with issues in the future. Facts enable man's ability and empowers confidence. For instance, based on clinical tests scientists are discovering new drugs but not abstract ideas and concepts. Ideas and concepts are visionary but facts are saving human lives.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. When I was a high school student, I usually learned just facts. It was a system of korean education. For example, in math class, I could learn a lot of information in a short period. However, I usually got low grades in each test. Because the teacher changed the style of problems in each test, I could not use such factors which I learned before. That's why I think understanding ideas and concepts is more important. Next, if I understand ideas and concepts of problems, I can use them in our lives. For instance, I learned the effective value of electronic products through my physics class. Therefore, I can save on utility fees because I can find which products are more effective than others in the home. Finally, if we knew about concepts and ideas of some accidents, unfortunate accidents would never happen in the future. For example, if we just know factors of invasion from other counties, the invasions would be faced again because we did not know how to prepare them.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Success is a very common word that people use very frequently to express their ambitions. It is probably the best goal someone may have and it can be reached in every field, but how? The main element needed to have success is studying. Studying will always bring somewhere better than where you are now and this is another great goal to which you should always aim at in your life. Another fundamental factor is risk. Risk is not a very common word, because when it is used, it usually represents a very difficult and intense situation. Apart from businessmen, people don't like this word very much. As a matter of fact, it is mainly used in business discussions. In economics, risk is what leads to success. For instance in stock exchanges, no one who hasn't ever risked is successful, and never will be. In business, you are compelled to gamble on tons and tons of factors that will determine the way through of your day and consequently of your life earnings. There is a great motto that states the importance of this curious behaviour risks, no earns! "It is a hundred percent correct and it illustrates very exhaustively what people's behaviour should be like. Yes, because risks are not to take only in business fields. Risks are at the basis of worthwhile living, morally and economically speaking. If this behaviour occurs, people would not do what they already do well, but they would improve. Improving implies some risks initially, but paradoxically in the end, it always brings you to riduce risks and gains in your life. So in conclusion, key advice to be given is:"Always improve, because in life there is always more to learn about and more to risk on. ".

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Communities , nowadays , need help more than any time before , especially from young people. I think that young people should prepare enough time to build up their societies , otherwise , they will not go ahead. There is no doubt that young people should grab their communities' hand to move ahead , or they will collapse infront of their eyes.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: "The world will change" was what our teacher told us one day. For my part, I think there will be fewer care in the twenty years than there is today for many reasons. First I think that the sources of energy will decrease, especially oil. So it will be hard to provide oil for cars. Now the oil price is over 70$. ! Unless they discover new sources of energy. In addition to prices of oil will get higher and higher. People will have problems getting gas for their cars. Second thing, the population of the world will increase. So it will be hard to drive because of traffic, and it will take a long time to move from one place to another. As most studies stated, and as many people immigrating from poor countries to the developed ones. Third, discovering new means of transportation such as subways, or express trains will be a good reason that people will leave cars. Because they are cheaper, faster, and safer. Also, Maybe there will be a new "generation" of means of transportation like rockets.
sents: ['"The world will change" was what our teacher told us one day. For my part, I think there will be fewer care in the twenty years than there is today for many reasons. First I think that the sources of energy will decrease, especially oil. So it will be hard to provide oil for cars. Now the oil price is over 70$. ! Unless they discover new sources of energy. In addition to prices of oil will get higher and higher. People will have problems getting gas for their cars. Second thing, the population of the world will increase. So it will be hard to drive because of traffic, and it will take a long time to move from one place to another. As most studies stated, and as many people immigrating from poor countries to the developed ones. Third, discovering new means of transportation such as subways, or express trains will be a good reason that people will leave cars. Because they are cheaper, faster, and safer.', 'Also, Maybe there will be a new "generation" of means of transportation like rockets.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: When i was fifteen years old ,my father told me something which i have never forgotten,and actually it helped me many times, he said "try to know small things about every subject and try to know everything about one subject". For that i tried from that time to identify which kind of sciences i should specialize in, and what are the related sciences which i should know about. I decided to specialize in structural design engineering and that forced me to do well in the academic subjects dealing with that science. but i find that to do that well i should have a good knowledge of mathematics , physics,mechanics and sometimes medical subjects. It seems to be strange, how can some medical subjects related to related to structural design ? the answer is the way the human being stands with his bones is similar to the way of structure to.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are good things and a few not very good things about travelling in a group led by a tour guide. The good thing is that you will get to meet a lot of people and you can also have friends and family in the group the group will have a person who will be your guide during the tour and know perfectly the places that you are going to visit and will give you an explanation of every place you visit during the tour and this guide will also answer all detailed questions about the places; I suppose that if this person is a tourist guide he should have study very well about the places the we would visit. You will get to meet a lot of people in the group and maybe become friends. You could not get lost with I guide because of what I mentioned before he has studied the places and knows the places very well. That is why he is a tour guide. He will give you advice on where you can shop, where not to go, which places are better than others, very good restaurants, and maybe have a party for his group! The not very good reasons for traveling in a group and led by a tour guide are that you have to stick with the group and follow them to all the places and you cannot wonder around to get to know the places you want to go and wake up late, have a very comfortable vacation. If you travel alone you can always get all the information you want and maps of the places you want to visit. You can make your own tour and be your own guide. And you can always find better places to be.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I completely agree with the statement which says that " Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well". Those people,who are well known, often want to be more popular and to attract more and more attention. We can talk about politicians as an example. Like Bill Clinton,former president of the United states of America,or Nelson Mandela,ex-president of South-Africa,who are helping the poor countries in africa and asia, a lot of this category of people work in organizations which have the same purpose. Another example is the entertainment artists. Many singers after being very successful and popular as singers try to move to Hollywood where they have the opportunity to start acting. And they even take a lot of risks like investing in a lot of businesses all over the world. The benefit for them is that they are known and they use their name to attract people;and even if their investment does not succeed , they are always able to try other things because they have the money they need. In the United states a lot of artists,singers and sports -players have their own company or team. Consequently,months after months,years after years, they become more and more successful and popular and try new things. Consequently,they seem to handle the world in the palm of their hands. In conclusion,people who are successful definitely try new things and risk;they rarely just do what they already know how to do well and most of the time, they do it to get more money thanthey own.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I strongly agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I think young people have less resources than older people. Older people have to earn money and take care of their family. For this reason, old people abandon their time and life for their family. Otherwise, young people do not have such a responsibility. They spend most of their time on their own life. In my case, I spend my time on playing games and sports, doing hobbies or watching movies. However, my parents can not enjoy what they want to do. They work every day to support us. Therefore, I think that enjoying life depends on the happiness of responsibility. For other reasons, young people are more energetic than old people. Even if someone really enjoys playing harsh sports but is not energetic enough, he can not do those sports.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I definitely agree with the statement, and I think the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide for three reasons. To travel where I have never visited before, it is hard to choose where to see around. When I visited Italy, I had a hard time scheduling where to go. There are many churches, cultural monuments, and famous concert halls to visit. I could not choose where to go first or where I definitely should go. However, when I travel with a group and a tour guide, the tour guide planned everything and scheduled everything efficiently. I do not have to waste time making decisions, and also I never miss famous places to visit. Sometimes it is hard to find a restaurant when I travel by myself. Usually, the place to travel is where to travel for the first time. So I have no information about the price of food, what to wear, and whether it tastes good or not. When I was a student and travelling to Italy, I was a backpacker. Since I was young, I have not spent much money on eating expensive foods.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Success doesn't happen overnight, it takes lots of work and dedication. I believe that successful people are risk takers. In this paper I will emphasize my opinion with three points: to be successful, people need to make mistakes, to be successful people need to take risks, to be successful you people to explore and try new things. First successful people are not perfect, they learn from their mistakes. By making a mistake a person diminishes his experience. The person also opens his mind to new ways of doing things. Often when someone makes a mistake he tries not to replicate the mistake later on. Let's take as an example Alexander Graham Bell, when he invented the telephone, he made lots of different adjustments some work some didn't. Second, in order to make a mistake a person needs to be willing to take risks. If no risks are ever taken there is not a mistake that can occur. The same things happen over and over again. The person is in a cycle. Going back to our example, Mr. Bell was deaf, how could he have invented a telephone? Don't you need to hear to be able to speak through a telephone? Mr.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: One of the big topics in this new century is the pollution of our world, especially of the air. To give our children a chance to live healthily in this world, there are some possibilities for air pollution: one of the most factors that cause air pollution is our cars. So a lot of states and countries think about strategies to increase the sum of cars in the next 20 years. They invest money in new and more economic bus-, train- or tube-systems. Using this transport system in the future has got a second advantage, too. In every big city, there is a parking-problem. But the cities are rising, too. And so every month there is a parking space for a new building. In future more and more people won't have an other possibility for arriving at their jobs than to use these public transport systems. So cars will be less on our streets. Another reason to disagree with this statement is the oil. In some years, there won't be as much oil as today on our earth and therefore the petrol price will rise in regions because many people won't be able to pay for it. Ok, there are inventions for non-petrol cars. But nobody really supports that because of the big influence of the oil industry. So a lot of people will sell their cars and move with public transport or trains. The third reason to disagree is that there will be new kinds of transportation-systems in 20 years.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays young people do not give enough time to helping their communities to some extent. Statisticians have shown that the number of participants in non-profit organizations has dropped dramatically over the past ten years. Young people have very much become money oriented and focused. I believe governments should come up with criteria and standards whereby they will give preference to awarding government projects, student schalorship to those who participate in serving the community vocally. In addition to that, there should be an awarding system where community servers will be announced publicly and their photos will be displayed publicly. There should be a top-down approach where the top people in the country set as role models and volunteers take part in helping their communities. I will recommend a cyclical dynamic process for such top down approach as follows "Policy, Plan. Perform. Monitor & review. It begins with commitment from the top , visibility as well as setting policy. This should be followed by proper planning, where the government has to prepare the infrastructure e. g.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Is a group led by a tour guide the best way to travel? I think it is, because when you go to a new place, sometimes you don't know the city well or you could take the risk of being missing. If you go to a new place, it would be better to be guided, so that if you have any doubt or any question, you will be sure that the guide will have the answer. You do not have to be concerned about knowing everything about the places, the buildings, the ways and you will only enjoy the trip. On the other hand, if you travel by yourself, without a guide, you must ask for some address or building name if you do not know it. It would take more time, it could be frustrating and it could make you spend a lot of money on taxis, buying maps or getting back from wrong places. A tour guide is a person who knows the places that he or she is showing, and he or she would teach you some history, because he would talk to you about the places you are visiting, its origin, its name, about what it is made of and all kinds of things that would take a lot of time to learn. It is safer for a person to travel in a group and with a tour guide because they do not take the risk of visiting dangerous places. The tour guide would tell you what places are safer, at what time is better to be and the right moment. Travelling in a group could be better because you can learn from the other people. If you don't know the name of a specific building, another person could know and tell you.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: This world we live in has always managed to find its way of a change such as what we have today: the common usage of cars every where. To be honest i would never suspect that there will be a fewer number of cars ever, because the world isnt made to help people find another means of transportation.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Many people say that we need to study a lot of subjects when we are high school students. Actually, when I was a student, I couldn't understand why I had to study everything. I wanted to study just because I love it. However, I really think that studying many academic subjects is more important than just one specific subject after I became an adult. There are two specific reasons why I do. First, we need to have knowledge of people's studies since humans appeared many many years ago as human beings. When humans were just born in ancient times, there wasn't anything but people studied themselves and invented many things so we are now. We need to study their history to study like mass, language, chemistry and so on. Then, If we study many academic subjects, students know which one is so interested in them. It's the most important thing. Because school is providing many subjects, students can learn new categories of study. It's good experience for them. After that, they can decide which one is really good for them and it's a good opportunity to find their major at university and job in the future. In conclusion, if people study just a specific subject, it's perhaps better.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Have you ever hoped that you would be 10 years younger or more? These days many people want to be young because when they think they are too old, they can not do many things. Consequently, I agree with the statement. young people enjoy life more than older people do. Making mistakes is not acceptable to adults. For example, if a person spread water on the carpet. If the person was a young person, people would understand and say "you did this because you are young. "However, if the person was an adult, people would think the person in a bad way such as, weird or selfish. Consequently, doing something or going somewhere is much more careful for adults. And yet, mostly, people feel fun when they are in a different place or situation. Therefore, for an adult it is difficult to plan out. For that reason adults have so much experience, it is easy to feel fear. When I was young my mother had a rice cake in her throat. Accordingly, she has not eaten any rice cake until now. Also she does not try to eat any rice cake even though it tastes so good. However, when she sees any kinds of rice cakes, she said it reminds her of the time. Consequently, to her it is really hard to try. Because older people are old, they have to think about their health and it is really hard to be fine after they have had an accident.

"However, if the person was an adult, people would think the person in a bad way such as, weird or selfish. Consequently, doing something or going somewhere is much more careful for adults. title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Whether young people enjoy life more than older people do or not draws a complex issue on the topic. Some people may say young people have a lot of fun, but the old do not. While others may oppose this opinion. If I have to choose a view, I will personally support the former claim. First of all, Young people have more opportunities to have fun from various aspects of society than old people do. People usually take it for granted that the conception of young means having fun, which is why our society provides more facilities for young people to do so. For example, the manufacturers produce various toys for babies, children, and even young adults. More over, many topics on TV concern the young, seldomly with the old. When I turn on my TV, I can find a lot of children's channels as interesting as Disney. In some countries, like China, there is only one child in a family. So both parents and grandparents will love her or him as precious as an apple, and provide her or him with all kinds of opportunities to have fun. Additionally, young people have a lot of energy and fewer responsibilities, which makes it easier for them to have fun. On the other hand, the old have to earn money in order to sustain the family. For instance, my father always looks tired after he comes home from his office and then he even refuses himself to have fun with me, which makes me very upset. As a wise man said (and I paraphrase ), " Time is money, and time is treasure". These words make those adults and olds think that they can not waste their time having fun at all, which might not be totally correct. Admittedly, our society provides old people with more and more opportunities and encourages them to have fun, especially when they get retired. After retiring, more and more old people feel bored and lonely at home. So they try to make more and more opportunities for themselves to have fun. The city government usually organize Senior Clubs which includes gym facilities, dance center, and so on. Even don't mention the chess clubs, singing clubs,. etc.
sents: ['Whether young people enjoy life more than older people do or not draws a complex issue on the topic. Some people may say young people have a lot of fun, but the old do not. While others may oppose this opinion. If I have to choose a view, I will personally support the former claim. First of all, Young people have more opportunities to have fun from various aspects of society than old people do. People usually take it for granted that the conception of young means having fun, which is why our society provides more facilities for young people to do so. For example, the manufacturers produce various toys for babies, children, and even young adults. More over, many topics on TV concern the young, seldomly with the old. The city government usually organize Senior Clubs which includes gym facilities, dance center, and so on. Even don\'t mention the chess clubs, singing clubs,.', 'etc.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement. First of all,every body agrees that successful people are not ordinary people. Because they've found a way to get richness and success while others are still stay poor in either their money or their futures. Successful people usually think differently. For instance,an average person who makes about 50 thousand dollars a year would probably save 10 to 20 thousand dollars in their bank accounts. What a successful person would do is use the money to invest other than put that much money into a bank. That's how a small amount of money gets larger and larger. Successful people think things in advance. They look at the market and they will know what hot deals are going on. They would find out which you can and which you cannot do. They would figure out which worthes the risk to invest in. In other words ,they have the intelligence to distinguish good stuff from bad stuff. Any way,successful people are usually businessmen. My friend John is a stock bloker who works on wall Street. He makes money only out of looking at how the stock goes. He usually works at home, and seldom goes out. But he knows every thing. He gets information from the internet. He's just more intelligent. Once he knows what the stock will go for,he knows for sure.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Knowledge "Its better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. "I agree with this statement because knowledge saves alot of people from a lot of dangerous things. "A little knowledge is dangerous. "I have faith in this saying lets take medicines such as pain killers as an example. People with a little knowledge of medicine think that taking more pain killers will help kill the pain faster, On the other hand well educated people will realise that taking overdoses of pills will have a lot of side effects on the person who takes these pills, thats why a person must have a broad knowledge of many academic subjects. This doesn't mean that the person must be well educated in everything, because the saying says: " A man of all trades is master of none. "It's hard to know each detail of every thing in life because this will refine your focus on the important thing in each subject in life. My advice to every one is to try to educate your self in every thing and this doesn't mean going through details in every thing. But each person must have a special subject to know every thing about, and try to gain information from different people you meet in your life with different education because: " Christmas comes but once a year.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with this statement. People who succeed in business usually try new things and take risks. To begin with, only new ideas can succeed. An old idea wouldn't make you rich or popular. only new ideas do. people are usually interested in new things because they think it is cool or trendy. For example, many people bought new types of video game like the Wii or Playstation3 in Japan. Some people bought these games on impulse because the news programs or TV showed a great system about them and made you buy them. Now,how about old type of videogames? Will you buy it? The answer is no even TV suggested it because you already know what the problem with these old games is and you can find out that TV's information is not always correct. Another reason is that risky decisions will be worth a lot. Many rich people try very hard to become rich. In another ward, they took many risks to aim for their goals. So risks and success are related. If you take risks, you might fail. However, you might do well. When the risks that you took are greater, the prize is also great. That's why people who didn't take risks wouldn't have success. It is similar to gambling. For example, my uncle went to the casino last year. He first played slot machines which needed only 10 cents.

text: Do successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well? Successful people try new things. To be successful is to be the best and different. If we are different that means that we are always looking for new things, new ideas. The world is always changing like that. I think that the reason that makes people successful is that they are always changing and having new things. If these people are taking risks? Of course they do ! But who cares ! Taking risks makes us feel as if we are in life. Life has become more exciting. Successful people are not scared of losing but they can't support always doing the same thing.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In my opinion, there will be fewer cars than today. the main reason for this is technological development that makes life easier day by day for today's people. We can also take the oil reserves in to consideration for the decrease in the number of cars. The technological development is so great and unpredictable that one can do something which might have only been a dream in the past like reaching the information he wants just by clicking some buttons. Therefore the development may result in the development of mass transportation and with the benefits of mass transportation ;like the cost and availability ; people will be willing to use them instead of using their personal vehicles. In twenty years there may be some kind of train which can go faster and cheaper than those of today's or mankind will invent a machine which can transport people to another place in seconds just like we watch in the science fiction movies like 'battle star galactica' or ' star wars'. There is another reason why there will be fewer cars on the roads that is the lack of oil reserves in the world. when you think that 99 percent of vehicles use oil for the energy they need this might sound more predictable unless the man kind finds another source of energy like sun or a kind of an element which can be used instead of oil. It does not make much sense to say this because the scientists spend more time finding other means of transportation than finding useful elements or sources of energy to do the work which oil does today.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree with this statement. I am only a high school student so I'm not really sure about how elderly people feel. But I'll state three reasons which I'm sure about. They are; we are all the same human beings, generation really doesn't matter, all people feel joy at different times. The first reason why I disagree is because, we are all the same human beings. It's true that the elderly as our grandparents lived in a difficult time such as the world wars. Eventhough I believe that they also had an enjoyable young age. For me, everything was fun when I was a little girl. watching ants in a line was even enjoyable. Therefore I'm not sure how our thoughts will change through when we get older, but'm I'm still sure that we won't forget. memories. The second reason is because, looking at my grandmother makes me feel the age doesn't matter to enjoy the events. She likes to go watching movies with friends and after coming back she always talks to me about how the movies were and what she did with her friends, with twinkling eyes. From these experiences I'm sure that she is enjoying her life as an elderly person. The last reason is because, I think that all people have different thoughts and feelings about the word enjoyment. I feel most of the things which made me feel happy were enjoyable. Even on the train watching other people sometimes makes me enjoyable.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The issue of whether it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than for them to learn facts is commonly discussed in our society. In my opinion the students' knowledge is improved when they understand not only the facts but the underlying ideas and concepts. In this essay i will support my answer with specific reasons and examples. Facts are definitely the students' knowledge base. Before any consideration the students need to know what happened. So teachers need to explain the facts without any comment or personal opinion. At a second, facts are separated into ideas and concepts. Teachers should help students to understand what drove the fact and what consequences it had. In our society is really important not only to know what is happening but also to understand the ideas and motivation. A great example is 11/09. Everybody saw what happened on the twin towers. The real knowledge comes from the understanding of nature and the cause of the terrorist attack. Only in this way can students go directly to the problem and try to find a solution. In conclusion I completely agree that students should analyse problems by learning the facts and understanding the ideas and concepts that are behind the facts. Only in this way will students be able to find the correct solutions to the problems that they will occur into.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Successful people do not have to try new things if they are satisfied with their success. They should improve their successful job rather than try totally new things. Of course, they can try new things but there is no promise of success again. I suppose that people who have achieved success are not so careful to try new jobs because they have confidence in their success.

Of course, they can try new things but there is no promise of success again.', 'I suppose that people who have achieved success are not so careful to try new jobs because they have confidence in their success.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays, there're so many debatable issues about young people's life style. In particular, some people think young people don't give enough time to helping their communities, so they look down on young people. However, I think the young generation spend enough time on their communities and they shouldn't spend more time helping communities. Because there's a major volunteering class ( in school), young people have numerous things to do without helping communities and young people's time is for dreaming. First of all, there're a lot of programs to make young people help communities, and almost all young people do it. For example, almost all schools force students to spend time helping communities in Korea. The required volunteer time is high, and connected with the grade. In that way, young people do help their communities. I think it is hard work for young people, and they have done well until now. Second, we should understand that the younger generation has numerous things to do and they want. When I think of the young generation from junior-highschool students to 30's, it's easy to guess that they are really busy. School, company, friends, family. Their heads are already full of things to concern them. In my case, I'm 21 years old, there're lots of things to do at my school and house. It involves homework, studying, housework. Actually, I couldn't breathe easily. There's no time to think about something unimportant. Like me, other young people have not enough time to draw the dream and future.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with this statement, "it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. I've been going to school for 12 years. I am a high school student. I learn many things at school. My favorite class is English class which i think is the most important subject we have to learn. In English class, we read some books and discuss what the book tells us. When we discuss books, everybody has different opinions and it is stimulating to know what other people say and figure out what the author is trying to say. There are too many messages in books for a person to understand by oneself. I think we need to discuss with many people who are smarter and have different ideas. The books don't tell us facts.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: In my opinion, young people really enjoy their life more than older people do. As we see some examples, we can figure out how much young people enjoy their life. Using those examples, we can generalize young people. Young people have enough time and are healthy, so they can try many things which they want to do. For instance, if old people want to do sky jumping, they usually can not do that because their body is very weak, but young people can do that without worrying about physical problems. Besides, if old people want to travel the whole world, it will take a lot of energy, but old people can not deal with that.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the opinion that most advertisements make products better than they are. Now we live in a high tech advanced society in the 21st century. All over the world are getting smaller by using the computer. We can exchange information together by all kinds of communication systems such as the internet and mass media. Even though we purchase one item, we try to get information about all resources. For a good example, most advertisements make customers guarantee their products. In order to become good brand products to appeal to customers , the company focuses on better products. We can't deny the advertising's importance in relating good products. Most consumers think that better products are introduced into the televisions, radios,and other mass media. Most advertisements should imply that advertisements' products guarantee good qualities to attract customers. Now most companies recognize that advertising products should be the best products than other ones to succeed in the business. To take the example of Coca Cola drinks, they are not American drinks any more. It is the world drink all over the global village.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: In my opinion, it won't be an exaggeration to say that young people do not spend time on their community. It is true that young people seldom do things for their community. The reason is simple. Young people have other things to do and; most of all, few young people have a sense of community. Seldom do young people in my country need to do anything for their communities. They are often told that they have to study hard. Their responsibility is to focus on their studies and their school work is always at the top of the priority list. To their "consederate" parents, things like helping their communities are taken as a bother to their children. Even if the task is as easy as cleaning the sidewalk around the community, parents will usually choose to finish by themselves rather than get their children involved. On the other hand, few young people nowadays have the sense of community. They don't even know who their neighbors are. How can it be possible to ask those indifferent people to pick up the garbage scattered in the house next to their house.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I think having knowledge of many academic subjects is better than specializing in one specific subject. There are two reasons and examples why I agree with this statement. If you have knowledge of general information, it would be useful in your life. For example, if you work in an office and your boss asks you to write a report, your knowledge would help you. Because you have different kinds of knowledge, you can think from different views. If you only have specific knowledge, you can only focus on one view which would make your report pretty poor. Knowing about many different things would help you at school as well. For example, because you have broad knowledge of many academic subjects, it would be useful in many situations, such as the examination and the interview. At the examination, you will surely get good grades because you have a lot of different knowledge, even though it does not specialize in one specific subject. Also at the interview, because you have different types of knowledge, you can answer the questions widely and you can appeal to how you understand general today's events and your cleverness as well. If you have knowledge which focuses on only one subject, it would be useless in many situations.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Yong people are the future of a nation and the motor of its growth and fulfillment. They have always represented the symbol of energy and hope. Nowadays,young people have to carry a big responsibility from elementary school to achieve their dreams. Since they have many concerns in life,they tend to give shorter time to help their community. I think that this matter is due to the interaction of many factors. The first major factor,is the school's busy schedule. This limits the time given for young people to do community work so they can't be very efficient since they do not have sufficienttime. The second matter, is the increasing number of video games and entertainment that encourages young people to isolate themselves in their rooms and spend hours with technological machines rather than integrate into a club or a volunteering association. This behavior leads to a vicious circle because the more these young people hide behind their computer screens and games the more they split from society and the community actions and the more they will be aware of the importance of community help.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree in parts with the statement that "Young people enjoy life more than older people do ". The statement stated by the author seems to be correct in some situations and proves to be wrong in other situations making this statement as debatable. I will give some examples to prove my point in this essay. The statement of the author mentions " enjoyment of life ". This term is very relative in respect of people. Every person tries to live his life colourfully in his own way. If enjoy means partying then it may be possible that young people are doing it more frequently than older people but when it comes to celebrating then older people do not step back from the younger generations. I do agree sometimes because younger generations are having better and suitable conditions for the time to enjoy themselves. Young people are enthusiastic , active and having energy to enjoy the sports events by playing and cheering , they are very eager to explore new places. Young People having interests in movies go for it whenever they get time , They go for a picnic to have a change and the thing that generally many young people enjoy is to dance continuously for hours. They enjoy various foods of different tastes at many times. This can be termed as enjoyment. If we accept the author's statement then it would be like that older people are not enjoying but carrying their life ahead only. The things which are done by the younger generation are being done by the older generation earlier and thus they have lost the charm in those things and they do not have enough strength to do the same thing continuously.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: A successful human would try different newer things in his life than the older things he is used to doing. Changing your habits is not an easy thing, but one is urged to do it for a number of reasons. A successful teacher should renew his lectures. This indicates that he is up to date and also refreshes his mind constantly. Also, this gives him a good reputation among other colleagues. Take me as an example, I teach pharmacy students at a Jordanian university, I keep getting newer information from different books and resources and include it in my lectures. It is troublesome, as it seems, but it keeps me fresh in information and with a good status among my colleagues. Also, this might give you the chance to create newer things. If you are a chemist, and you are constantly trying to change your ways of making, or synthesizing, chemical compounds, you might come up with less expensive methods. The newer method is considered an invention in its own, and it also saves money. Also, you might think of changing your view, clothes or even your hair cut.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I disagree with this sentence up to a point. In my opinion successful people lead the world, and thanks to their works and abilities our world is evolving every day, every minute, every year. In the world's history many examples of famous scientists, politicians, artists and so on can prove that without their talent our civilization would be much more primitive. Christophe Colomb was a famous sailor of the past centuries, he was a risk taker and that characteristic of his behaviour led him to discover America although his life and all the crew were in danger. Successful people are never satisfied with themselves that is why they always want to look further, to have new projects more and more insane. The curiosity and the risk keep them alive, they need it. The world wouldn't be so fantastic if people were all cowards! Ernesto Che Guevara was a good doctor in south America but his political ideas were so strong that he left everything to join the Cuban revolution.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I had a trip to Che-ju island in my country, Korea, with my friends, and it was a trip that was led by a tour guide. After the journey, there were more bad memories than good ones, for these reasons : choosing visit places, and the problem of extra fees. Regarding my experiences, I disagree with the opinion that a tour group led by a tour guide is the best way to travel. First of all, People robbed their rights to choose the spots to visit, If the travel team is organized and led by a tour guide, people on the team have to follow the schedule which is made by the guide. For example, I couldn't visit the museum which exhibits the numerous kinds of unique plants grown only in Han-ra mountain in Che-ju island. Instead of that, we merely followed the typical travel courses like teddy bear museum, and restaurants that sell black pig. What  a waste of time! ! I can see such a thing not only on the island, but in my town.
sents: ["I had a trip to Che-ju island in my country, Korea, with my friends, and it was a trip that was led by a tour guide. After the journey, there were more bad memories than good ones, for these reasons : choosing visit places, and the problem of extra fees. Regarding my experiences, I disagree with the opinion that a tour group led by a tour guide is the best way to travel. First of all, People robbed their rights to choose the spots to visit, If the travel team is organized and led by a tour guide, people on the team have to follow the schedule which is made by the guide. I can see such a thing not only on the island, but in my town.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: People perceive enjoyment in different ways. Enjoyment for me may mean playing soccer but at the same time enjoyment for my grandpa may mean meditating or reading. I may endorse enjoyment in a different sense. Enjoyment is a personal view and not a general one. I would refute the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Enjoyment is an aspect of life in its own way, carrying a special meaning. Before the teenager, playing with friends for long hours may be the ultimate source of enjoyment for kids. During the teenage years, chatting with friends on the phone,talking to the opposite sex may be thrilling & enjoyable. Typical pangs of adolescence as we call it. Post teenage,i. In college life,we may like to hang out with our friends for parties,movies,festivals etcetera. It would certainly mean enjoyment. Pre-marriage job life would add some other kind of dimension to the definition of enjoyment of life like going out shopping.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays people are living in a mixed world with all kinds of generations and where the community grows faster. How can you help your communities with the time you have? ? ? First of all, in my opinion, I am a student of twenty years old, and I would say that in your everyday life,you never find any time for all you want to do. As far as I am concerned,I would say that giving time to other people, or being investigated in an activity requires a lot of human qualityand a strong engagement. It might not be easy to help our community when you have responsibility at work, at home, with children. In order to manage a good way of living we have to make choices at any time during our own life. Secondly , we can consider the problem from a different point of view. If you are living in a huge town it will be more difficult to help the community than living in the country. Thanks to their small village in the country,everybody knows everybody. The fact of the densification of the population,it's easier and faster to link and create central meetings. Obviously, the democracy will grow up with the help of younger people. I don't really agree with the fact that young people do not give enough time to the community.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: It is difficult to make a certain prediction about this topic, because on the one hand taking care of the environment is becoming more and more important nowadays and on the other hand technology is definitely part of our life. Anyway, I believe that in twenty years there will be fewer cars than there are today because modern life moves fast, communications are very important and there are new, ecological energies that can avoid car pollution. Modern life moves fast, especially in big cities. People in big cities work very hard and work many hours. For that reason these workers really appreciate their free time and want to be able to move fast to enjoy it. Nowadays public transport is not as useful and efficient as having your own car. Having a car is not that expensive, so many people can afford to have their own car. The economy is growing 3 per cent every year so hopefully in twenty years people will be able to buy nicer cars, instead of having to take the subway or the bus.

For that reason these workers really appreciate their free time and want to be able to move fast to enjoy it. Nowadays public transport is not as useful and efficient as having your own car. Having a car is not that expensive, so many people can afford to have their own car. The economy is growing 3 per cent every year so hopefully in twenty years people will be able to buy nicer cars, instead of having to take the subway or the bus. The globalization movement has made communications very important. It is true that others' means of transport may be developed, but having their own car allows citizens to go wherever they want whenever they want. Globalization is called to become more and more powerful, that's why i believe that people will like having their own car in twenty years. One of the main problems with cars is that they damage the environment. Anyway, countries are spending a lot of money investigating renewable energies that do not damage the environment. That will allow the car industry to use these new sources of energy to car construction. Hopefully, in twenty years cars will be respected for the environment, so people won't mind driving their own car. In my opinion in twenty years there will be as many cars as nowadays because of the necessities and characteristics of modern life.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: As I am trying to assess the state of the number of cars being used twenty years down the line, we can primarily look at the things that might actually be the core reasons, which can minimise the use of cars The reasons I see for the decrease in the number of cars are to decrease consumption of fuel as fuel is being scarce day by day, to decrease environmental pollution, people looking for more faster means of transport, might become too expensive. As we can see from the reasons, to decrease the consumption of fuel, there is no need to curb the use of cars instead we can try and invent new means of fuel for ignition, for instance people have already started using cooking gas as fuel, but it is agreed that it is too dangerous as a small spark can ignite the whole vehicle, so research has to be conducted to develop. and the ease of availability of cooking gas is also specious, but there is definitely an alternate way to produce fuel Another reason for the decrease might be that maintaining a car might become too expensive, as the number of cars increased the consumption of fuel increased too, this led to a decrease in the availability of fuel or over all depletion of the fuel in the world, this will lead to increased fuel costs. Not only this for maintaining a car, we need a space to park it, increasing use of this means of transport in metropolitan cities has decreased the availability of space, sometimes getting small amounts of space is much more expensive than one can visualize. People might choose more reliable and faster means of transport, which may be some cheaper air transport. This is not a completely imaginative idea, but this has already been put to practice to create a few planes which can be used by ordinary people, if these become more compact, easier and faster, people might well opt for the same, but this might not be possible in just twenty years. infact, I believe that there might be many more cars than what we currently have, if the rise in the use of cars is considered.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with this statement "Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well". I support my answer by giving a simple example. Consider the case of Micheal Faraday,the person responsible for today's electricity we are enjoying. If he thinks like a common man that the light we get from the candle is enough,we would not have enjoyed all the benefits we enjoy today to lead a comfortable and a peaceful life in this present IT world. He started his ideas that oppositely charged electrons can travel towards each other and finally he struggled a lot and showed the world that electrons can travel and enlightened us not only with his theories but also with his innovations. Without electricity there is no electricity today. He crossed all his way from the abuses of the critics to a person who has become the FATHER OF ALL ELECTRICAL ENGINEERS and who made all the lives of the world comfortable today.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: We can see all kinds of advertisements on TV. Some of them are creativity and make the products look useful. What is the purpose of the advertisement? We can understand the following reasons. First, customers are willing to buy the product after watching the advertisement. Second, Give the customers enough information about the product in a short time. Third, there are many competitions in the same kind of product. Even though the sales people understand their product is good, customers will never know if they never buy it. All they can do is to show their products in advertisements. Although sometimes it seems much better than they really are, it is just strategy. Other companies also use the same method. We all know that if the advertisements want to be watched as many viewers as they can, we should put them in the popular programs. It costs a lot of money. If we cannot give customers enough information about what the product is, it just wastes money. The best way is to pretend it is really attractive and useful. Sometimes customers do not understand what the difference between one company's product and others' products is. The only difference is the advertisement. Every company tries to make their product look better than they really are. In conclusion, although I would like to buy the product better than it shown in the advertisement, i do not how to choose the product if i have never used it.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: many people have a different point of view about the idea of enjoying life. some think that young people enjoy life more than older people do. in contrast to this some think that older people have become knowledgeable about life and so they can enjoy it more than young people. i personally agree with the second idea because i think that young people have more important problems than old people, so they can't enjoy life as much as old people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: many people have a different point of view about the idea of enjoying life. some think that young people enjoy life more than older people do. in contrast to this some think that older people have become knowledgeable about life and so they can enjoy it more than young people. i personally agree with the second idea because i think that young people have more important problems than old people, so they can't enjoy life as much as old people. First of all, older people have met life a long time ago and their stress about the future is less than young people, so they can enjoy life easily. for example, many young people have a concern about the future. they feel stressed about their schools, jobs or career. they may be afraid of graduating from their university with low degrees or finding a job with low prices. however older people generally don't have such problems because their schools are finished, their jobs are suitable. i can explain this to my family. i have a concern about my career because sometimes i think that i will not finish my university or even if i graduate i won't find a good job. maybe i will not be able to find a handsome and intelligent man to love me. so i am afraid of being a lonesome and poor woman in my future. however, when i see my father and mother, they are more relaxed than me. they have worked twenty five years and they bought two houses and one car, their two little daughters grew up and they studied at good schools. therefore now they can spend their time and moneytravelling. last holiday, they went to Paris because they wanted to see what Paris looked like! however i can't go with them because i have four exams and i have to study all day. Secondly, older people have money and time to enjoy life. young people need money and their pocket money is not enough for some activities. however, when a person has a job and he is paid well, he can do what he wants in his holidays and free time. for example, even if two people enjoy reading books, one who is younger can't buy a book that he wants, the other can buy all of the books the writer has written. also, younger people can't find free time to do it. for instance, i like watching films and i know it is a simple activity. however i can't do it everytime because my school is very hard. also i live in a big city and i don't have a car so my time is spent on the buses.
