This will imply the usage of more cars than in today\'s era. 3. Cars are means of transport. In twenty years business will grow rapidly in differentareas. More packages will have to be delivered or transferred. So this will result in a larger number of transfers hence an increase in the number of cars. 4.', 'In the next twenty years fashion/glamour will also increase.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Nowadays, there is a great generation gap between young people and older people. Sometimes they are quite distinguished from others. It was generally agreed that Young people enjoy life more than older people do. But in my opinion, I don't agree with the opinion. In the first place, many young people enjoy their life so much. They are very modern and familiar with all the new-coming products. For instance, the internet, electronic products, and new conventions are made great use of by them. They realize what the real world is and have their ideal life style. Their idea is to make the world colorful, fun and full of significance. Only by doing things for society can they feel real happiness. In contrast, there still remains a large number of young people who are doing nothing everyday. If they were asked what they were doing, they would answer they were enjoying themselves. They drink, do sports, play computer games ,change boyfriends frequently ,rob money or small items from children and do whatever they can.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with this statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. I have bought many products so far, and I am going to have to buy many products in the future. In my opinion, there are many products which are different from my image. When we watch TV, we see many advertisements, and most products we see on TV are very attractive to us. Companies which make products are in competitive situations everyday. They have to make better products than other companies. Advertisements are very important for these companies to sell all products. Therefore, these companies have to make attractive advertisements even though the product is only about good things. This is their business. I usually decide to buy products when I see the advertisement. However, when I went to a store and saw the product, I sometimes thought that it was different from my image. Finally, I gave up buying the product. It happens sometimes. Therefore, products are not necessary the same as the advertisements. When the products are not the same as our images, it makes us disappointed. Therefore, I agree with this statement. Most advertisements are made to attract people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Young people are full of energy and in possession of an active body and a healthy mind. They really enjoy life much more than older people. who are weak and frail. Young people can go for what they want to do. They have the vigour, stamina, active brain, sound health and energy to achieve their goals. While, senility makes a person dull and it also comes with many diseases, which leave their body inactive. If a young person has a desire to take a world tour then he can go for it. But, such ideas have to "nipped in the bud" by older people. They will not enjoy such an adventure, but will create problems for them and their relatives. You are in demand if you are in the possession of a young body, a young soul. That makes life enjoyable for a young person. He feels he is wanted by society, by friends and family. On the other hand, older people are ignored by most of them. Most of the time they have to either read something or sit infront of theTV. These all tasks make their life a bore. Older people's lives are like a train which has got an engine only and that engine is also malfunctioned and can stall anytime.

While, senility makes a person dull and it also comes with many diseases, which leave their body inactive. If a young person has a desire to take a world tour then he can go for it. But, such ideas have to "nipped in the bud" by older people. They will not enjoy such an adventure, but will create problems for them and their relatives. You are in demand if you are in the possession of a young body, a young soul. That makes life enjoyable for a young person. He feels he is wanted by society, by friends and family. On the other hand, older people are ignored by most of them. Most of the time they have to either read something or sit infront of theTV. These all tasks make their life a bore.', "Older people's lives are like a train which has got an engine only and that engine is also malfunctioned and can stall anytime."]

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I think the community has to help itself, it is not only a moral obligation of young people! What do you mean for young people? Teenagers? A 30-year-old man is still young, but he is not a young man for the community! All people have to give time to helping the community! All the people do not care about others, only a few people, like the men who go to Africa to help the poor populations! They give all their life to helping the community. As you can see they are not young people, so all the people do not give time to helping, above all the young  people. But now society is different, it is not like 50 years ago, there's been a lot of changes, people need different things, nowadays a young man needs to study, to realise himself! How can I help a person if I do not feel well? I have to realise myself, I have to study, sometimes I have to relax, sometimes I need to have fun. Young people are a particular kind of people, but I think they are the most important part, they are the future, so they have to realise themselves and one day they will be able to help other people, but not today, it is not the most important thing now; the old men can help the others, because they do not have other things to do, now they can use what they learn in the past! May be in the past young people had more responsibilities , I do not know, and I could not, but as I said before, time has changed, time is a circle, today it is your turn, tomorrow it will be mine.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In the past few decades cars have been the most useful vehicle in the world. The use of cars is still increasing rapidly. There are many people saying the negative aspect s of cars, though I think the increase in car use will go on in the next twenty years or maybe more. The carbon dioxide which is emitted from those cars is said to be a big cause of global warming. This negative aspect should be prevented, but there are still a large share of cars. Why cannot people use trains and other social transport. In that way car users will be decreasing and it will be good for the environment. When I was still a child and did not have a driver's license I thought the pollution the car makes was evil and something that one needs to prevent. After a few years when I got the license the thought of pollution went somewhere else from my mind. It is just so useful. I think cars are like smoking. We know that this is a bad habit. Despite this fact, people just cannot quit it. The usefulness of cars affects the people. No one wants to be on a bus or a train when you see the people on there getting squashed and missable. We think we will use the car,more privately and more conveniently. I believe cars will not decrease forever. People cannot prevent th e desire to use such useful things so we need to think of another way, like inventing a car that is ecological. The amount of car share will be increasing as the population rises.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: According to me the best way to travel is not in a group led by a tour guide. first of all, the best way to enjoy travelling is to go with an other person, It'sn't good to go with a group, because it's difficult to share your feelings and make a plan quickly and efficiently with many people together. For example if you need to shop you have to be worried about the feelings of your group, but it's easier when you travel with a friend or a member of your family to change the schedule of your journey. Secondly, all of your movements during the trip are restricted because you are in a group. For instance, if you have a plan to enjoy eating in a different restaurant, if you will meet many new people, it's not possible to do this in a group because during the trip you are always with your group, so you don't have the time to meet someone and the travel can be boring. Finally, if you travel with a guide you are not able to quit the group and to do what you want to do. You have to follow the instruction of the tour guide it's like travel information that's not good. For example if you go to some country in Africa like Ivory Coast, all the tourists like to go to yamoussokro to see the biggest catholic church in the world, the tourists don't take the time to visit the capital which contains some interesting stuff too. In conclusion the best way to travel is with a partner like a friend or a member of your family it's more fun. On the other hand, that depends on what you are planning to do and what's your purpose is. For instance if you want to travel for a history class or whatever. I agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.

text: Nowadays, there are many people who believe that only doing what they already know how to do well is true. Nevertheless, I absolutely disagree with this point completely. I think that successful people try things and take risks to become successful. There are many successful people who also take many high risks before they / become successful and well-known. Bill Gates is a typical example in this situation. When Bill Gates was still a student at university, he realized that he would be a great man and hired by a big company with a great amount and stable salary after he graduated.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Some people believe that the products in advertisements are the same as the real ones because they look like the real ones. However, I do not agree with it. I believe most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are because of well-taken pictures and the strategy of companies. First of all, well-taken pictures are very attractive. The purpose of advertising is to show the products well to people. For performing that purpose, the products in advertisements should be in good shape. A friend of mine, he works in an advertisement company in Korea. One day, he showed me two pictures of apples. One was just a regular picture and the other one was a picture that he added some color balance with photoshop. Two pictures were totally different from each other, and he said that his company would use the latter picture for the apple advertisement. For this reason, I believe that the goods in advertisements are in better shape than the real ones. Moreover, advertising should make people want the products, and that is the strategy of advertisements. For letting people buy the goods, the advertisements have to use any way to attract people even if they exaggerate. One day, I saw the advertisements for Kim-chi, Korean traditional food, on television shopping.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I am completely positive about the statement. Here i would like to mention some reasons why group travel is the best way to travel. I work for a travel company as a tour guide, so i guess i confirm the advantages of group travelling. First of all, tourists feel secure when they are travelling with plenty of people and their guide, who is a local resident of the site. Group travelling people can defend themselves in difficult times and it is more likely to attract public attention for requesting help. In some places, it is suggested to tourists not to go out alone because of the high velocity rate. The second reason why i prefer group travel is payment for the travel costs. Needless to say, it is noticably cheaper than single travel for certain countries. Even a number of tour companies offer special programmes for group tourists, not only discounts, but also free-of-charge trips for group leaders or a certain number of members. The third reason serves our company's main goal, More people, more fun. It is very interesting to travel with many different people in order to have a real vacation. Group tourists can attend different competitions, matches and other attractive entertainment. Travelling is not only the meaning of travelling, but of making friends and getting relationships with them. It offers people more chances to make friends in an easier way. I know of many occasions when tourists get married after a long, exciting tour.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with this sentence. Even though most young people have enough time to give a helping hand to theif communities, they don't, I think. Most young people have time for themselves. For example, they play sports, see movies, and so on. They always enjoy "their time". There are few young people who have such "time".
